, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In kundalini yoga we\nare mainly concerned with working on the physical and astral bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QsjOaR0gwlk/UMgLfGFeFoI/AAAAAAAAZZQ/nUcKUp9CVTE/s1600/jkllli.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QsjOaR0gwlk/UMgLfGFeFoI/AAAAAAAAZZQ/nUcKUp9CVTE/s320/jkllli.jpg\" width=\"287\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pranayama is a yoga of\nbreath , just one of the several methods , used to awaken the Kundalini \u2013 or rather\ndisturb &nbsp;Shakti serpent from its deep\nslumber at the Mooladhara chakra at the bottom of your spine using heat. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Originating in\nMuladhara chakra , the Ida nadi ends up in the left nostril and the Pingala nadi\nends up in the right nostril. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z6jg1bJf-T4/UMgTuJJvB0I/AAAAAAAAZaE/AlccXct7LEM/s1600/images+(2)+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z6jg1bJf-T4/UMgTuJJvB0I/AAAAAAAAZaE/AlccXct7LEM/s1600/images+(2)+(1).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once awakened feminine Shakti is eager to mate\nwith her male consort Shiva at the Sahasrara chakra on top of your head .&nbsp; Most human beings on this planet have never\nawakened the divine serpent of three and a half coils , and have led base , crude lives and passed on.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What\na waste.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eKYeyv4bz4s/UMgT8R74FoI/AAAAAAAAZaM/OHVmWKaBefY/s1600/downloadiiii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eKYeyv4bz4s/UMgT8R74FoI/AAAAAAAAZaM/OHVmWKaBefY/s1600/downloadiiii.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The serpent has 3 choices of pathway- the ida, the pingala or the\ncentral sushumna.&nbsp; If it passes via ida\nor pingala the serpent is likely to get stuck at some intermediate chakra ( due\nto block ) causing extreme trauma, as what happened to Pandit Gopikrishna .. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the right nostril\nis flowing, the left hemisphere of the brain is activated. When the left\nnostril is flowing, the right hemisphere is activated. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moving from macrocosmic\nto microcosmic to atomic, at every level, two great principles or forces can be\nseen at work motivating our universe. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nour 7000 year old vedic texts it is called &nbsp;Tamas-Rajas , in modern times it is called Yin-Yang.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FY1trC8zhP0/UMgVbhyYGCI/AAAAAAAAZak/GE6RY0jNsuY/s1600/images+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FY1trC8zhP0/UMgVbhyYGCI/AAAAAAAAZak/GE6RY0jNsuY/s1600/images+(1).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Examples:</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WJ-McbI-soM/UMgUr_WorHI/AAAAAAAAZaU/EgujY5Gg4ZM/s1600/imagesuioop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">It is about the quantum possibility wave vibration between two poles.\nTogether they express the great void at absolute peace with itself.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a perfect tango\nof dynamic balance where one polar opposite changes into another smoothly and\nconstantly . If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost , the universe\nwill spiral out of control and end. This guarantees change, growth and\nevolution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hiWFDQiwLKo/UMgU7DaKetI/AAAAAAAAZac/p6z1kcwcKlQ/s1600/imagesyiop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hiWFDQiwLKo/UMgU7DaKetI/AAAAAAAAZac/p6z1kcwcKlQ/s400/imagesyiop.jpg\" width=\"232\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lessening of Yin- always results in increase of Yang and vice versa. &nbsp;One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in\nthis universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet\nsupport each other. Whatever is in excess gets reduces, whatever is deficient\ngets replenished.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UwM-RgW0oI8/UMgWSZMDZcI/AAAAAAAAZbE/GHLjw3-EqlI/s1600/images+(2).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UwM-RgW0oI8/UMgWSZMDZcI/AAAAAAAAZbE/GHLjw3-EqlI/s320/images+(2).jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balance can never be\npermanent\u2014 Ying and Yang continuously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8MAnYm-7IhM/UMgWNh1555I/AAAAAAAAZa8/4eqvb53AAyY/s1600/imagesuoopp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8MAnYm-7IhM/UMgWNh1555I/AAAAAAAAZa8/4eqvb53AAyY/s1600/imagesuoopp.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscious</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n= induction + deduction ( determines what is to be done ). &nbsp;LEFT BRAIN LOBE ( for right handers ) : Numbers, written language,\nreasoning, spoken language, scientific skills , RH control<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious\n</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">=\nonly deduction ( no thinking , draws conclusions, does not care for right or\nwrong, gives the power to do the job ) RIGHT BRAIN LOBE ( for right handers ):\nInsight, 3D forms , art, imagination, music, left hand control.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The central nervous\nsystem does not know the difference between visualization and the event.\nVisualizing you are having sex and doing the real thing has the same standing \u201covation\neffect\u201d on a man or a \u201ccreaming effect\u201d on a woman. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\npicture in our mind has an impact on every cell in our bodies. Thinking is not\nan action of the mind , but an action of our entire body. Tell your\nsubconscious what you want repeatedly and it will produce it. You can call this\nvisualization or intention. In India people realized this and more and more\npeople started going the spiritual way for bliss.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Indian kings in all their\npractical wisdom realized this and made all those Hindu temples with stone\nstatues amazing sexual content, to wean away a potential yogi who could have\nbeen a soldier or a farmer or a husband..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kuGufkN3n0U/UMgYQ1CGLRI/AAAAAAAAZbM/k0NdVsMgBWk/s1600/imagesjop0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"190\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kuGufkN3n0U/UMgYQ1CGLRI/AAAAAAAAZbM/k0NdVsMgBWk/s400/imagesjop0.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are poised between\nlife and death and our whole existence is a struggle to retain balance between\nthese two dual forces. &nbsp;Vedic Maharishis who were yogis realized the existence of these forces and\nunderstood their relationship. They said that man has three main flows of\nenergy nadis-- ida, pingala and sushumna, and which have\nbeen roughly translated as body, mind and spirit. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala can be deemed\nas the dynamic, active, masculine, positive, yang , Tamas energy within our&nbsp;&nbsp; personality.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;It&nbsp;&nbsp; has&nbsp;&nbsp;\na&nbsp;&nbsp; physical&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmental&nbsp;&nbsp; side.&nbsp;&nbsp; Its&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmaterial&nbsp;&nbsp; qualities&nbsp;&nbsp; are&nbsp;&nbsp;\nlight,&nbsp;&nbsp; heat, solar, energy\naccumulating, creative, organizing, &nbsp;focused (centripetal) and contractive. The\npositive, dynamic mental side within Freud's system is Eros, the pleasure\nprinciple, and in Jung's system is the conscious personality, the rational,\ndiscriminating side. We can say that pingala is &nbsp;psychosomatic energy, outwardly directed, mind\nacting on body to motivate <i><b>the organs of action, the karmendriyas</b></i>. It is the\nbasic energy of life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ljnZD1En1wY/UMgkjKmOQKI/AAAAAAAAZdg/lWxvI9t-Oh8/s1600/downloadjkoo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"218\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ljnZD1En1wY/UMgkjKmOQKI/AAAAAAAAZdg/lWxvI9t-Oh8/s320/downloadjkoo.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida is the energy\nwithin the personality which is passive, receptive, feminine, negative, yin. At\nthe physical level it is dark, cold, lunar, energy dissipating, disorganizing,\nentropic, expansive (centrifugal) and relaxing. At the mental plane Freud called\nit Thanatos, the death instinct, and Jung called it anima, the unconscious,\nfemale within, emotional, feeling, intuitive and non-discriminating, the\nbackground on which the differences can be seen and which unifies. This is the\nsomopsychic aspect of man, where energy is inwardly directed, and body acts on\nthe mind. Ida controls <i><b>the sense organs or gyanendriyas</b></i> and therefore gives us\nknowledge and awareness of the world we live in. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third force if the mediator\nmiddle prong of Shiva\u2019s trident called Sattva. When two opposing forces are\nequal and balanced a third force arises. Strike a match on a matchbox and you\ncreate fire, bring positive and negative currents together and you can work\nmachinery, unite body and mind and a third force called sushumna, spiritual\nenergy, arises.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>This is one of the aims of yoga, because only when sushumna\nawakens can the super power of kundalini, this maximum force, ascend safely to\nfuel, power and create cosmic consciousness.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sushumna is a high tension power\nline and ida and pingala carry the domestic lines to power the basic\nnecessities. Few of us realise this third, spiritualized state and most of us\noscillate from one state to another. Every 90 to 180 minutes ida and pingala\nalternate their dominance and only for a few minutes does sushumna\ncome into potential being.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the goal of all yogic techniques to balance\nand harmonize ida and pingala, life force and conscious awareness, so that they\njoin at ajna chakra to create the inner light of knowledge and bliss and reveal\nthe truth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nadis are flows of energy which move through each and every part of\nour body, the subtle counterpart of the physical flows such as nervous energy\nand blood. All of the 72000 nadis in the body are based on ida and pingala\nwhich spiral around the spinal cord.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Wv3UkbE5SOs/UMgkLkFJtsI/AAAAAAAAZdQ/fo2tT07qHDw/s1600/downloaduip%5B%5B.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Wv3UkbE5SOs/UMgkLkFJtsI/AAAAAAAAZdQ/fo2tT07qHDw/s320/downloaduip%5B%5B.jpg\" width=\"228\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the basic two modes of function\non which all of our bodily and mental processes work. Sushumna is the royal\nroad which takes us to higher awareness and transforms the function of ida and\npingala .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each and every cell of our body, every organ, the brain and mind,\neverything is polarized and interconnected at both the physical and subtle\nlevels, and this allows us to think, speak and act in a concerted, balanced,\nsynchronous manner, every part working to help every other part.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two\nbasic systems in the body that control this, ida and pingala, and if we\nstimulate any component of one system we turn on the whole system.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">This&nbsp;&nbsp; is&nbsp;&nbsp;\nhow&nbsp;&nbsp; asana,&nbsp;&nbsp; pranayama,&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmeditation,&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp;\nwhole&nbsp;&nbsp; armamentum&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp;\nyogic techniques work. This is how yoga\naffects the nadis. &nbsp;Nadis are psychic&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">channels</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;for distribution of prana in&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">the</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;astral body.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The brain has an almost infinite capacity, and all of it within\nthe two kilograms or so of amorphous,&nbsp;&nbsp;\npinkish&nbsp;&nbsp; grey&nbsp;&nbsp; brain&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmatter&nbsp;&nbsp; with&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp;\nconsistency&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp; jelly&nbsp;\n. How this &nbsp;jelly-like substance\nremembers, thinks, analyzes, feels, discriminates, intuits, decides, creates and\ndirects all the countless functions of the body, integrating the whole so that\nwe synchronize action, speech and thought, is something that each of us should ponder about..&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain, houses the master\ncontrol systems for the body within its unlimited circuitry, and it contains the circuits for the nadis and chakras. The brain is also the interface\nbetween the body and the mind. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All sensory information travels to the brain via\nthe gyanendriyas ( the sense organs of knowledge ), and is then fed into the mind,\nand all decisions in the mind are then translated into the body via the\nkarmendriyas,( the organs of action ) , in a continuous, seamless , synchronous, dynamic process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sensory-motor\nnervous system (SMS)&nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> : all electrical activity in the body\nmoves in one of two directions, into the brain (afferent), ida, and out of the\nbrain (efferent), pingala. Yogis called the sensory nerves which are governed\nby ida, as gyanendriyas, The motor nerves, governed by pingala, &nbsp;as karmendriyas.\nThese nerves are concerned with perception of and activity in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Autonomic\nnervous system (ANS)</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;is\ndivided into the outward directed, stress handling, energy utilizing, pingala\ndominant, sympathetic nervous system, or the inwardly directed, rest handling,\nenergy conserving, ida dominant, parasympathetic nervous system. These two\nsystems control and regulate all the automatic body processes: heart, blood\npressure, respiration, digestion, liver and kidney and so on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Central\nnervous system&nbsp; (CNS)</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;consists&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp; brain&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp;\nspinal&nbsp;&nbsp; cord&nbsp;&nbsp; and contains the controls for the SMS and\nANS. &nbsp;The brain contains much more than this though, for it is a huge,\nultimately complex computer, which stores and integrates information and puts\nour decisions into action in a superbly synchronized and orchestrated\nperformance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its functioning is definitely much more than its parts. Within the&nbsp;&nbsp; infinite&nbsp;&nbsp;\ncircuitry&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp;\nbrain&nbsp;&nbsp; resides&nbsp;&nbsp; more&nbsp;&nbsp;\npotential&nbsp;&nbsp; than&nbsp;&nbsp; we&nbsp;&nbsp;\ncan&nbsp;&nbsp; realize&nbsp;&nbsp; in&nbsp;&nbsp;\none lifetime, however, the techniques of yoga systematically clear and\nstrengthen these circuits with regular practice. This is what yogis have been\ntelling us, that the circuitry for nadis and chakras exist within the CNS,\nalong the spine and in the brain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G8-dJ_YeS_Y/UMgfGJfUm2I/AAAAAAAAZcA/LdkCdOIciaI/s1600/imagesCAGAZ7WM.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"290\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G8-dJ_YeS_Y/UMgfGJfUm2I/AAAAAAAAZcA/LdkCdOIciaI/s400/imagesCAGAZ7WM.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we can tap, purify,\nstrengthen and reconnect these circuits via the various yogic techniques, we\ncan totally transform our mind/&nbsp;&nbsp;body&nbsp;complex . Only when the left brain lobe (Pingala) and the right brain lobe (Ida) &nbsp;work together can we appreciate the moral of a story, the measuring of a metaphor,\nwords describing emotion, or the punch line of a joke. A computer can never understand the\nmoral of a story ( like stitch in time saves nine ) or a funny joke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I once had a Chief\nOfficer on my ship who had never ever breathed through his nose due to a bone\novergrowth. Only I know what he was worth -- as such a man cannot go (or grow\nmentally) beyond a limit. He can never pass a Mensa test. &nbsp;They see the explicit, the facts, but cannot\nunderstand what has been implied. The important points in their sentences are\nlost and are submerged or flattened, becoming part of the background.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nPX87WIPvtA/UMgk9JiLcEI/AAAAAAAAZdw/3vkyzet5yjI/s1600/downloadkop%5B.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nPX87WIPvtA/UMgk9JiLcEI/AAAAAAAAZdw/3vkyzet5yjI/s1600/downloadkop%5B.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When one nostril has\ndominant air flow, &nbsp;the opposite hemisphere\nof the brain is dominant. &nbsp;Forceful\nbreathing through the more congested nostril awakens the less dominant\nhemisphere The nasal cycle is also linked to the basic rest/activity cycle, which\nincludes within the sleep cycle, the rapid eye movement (REM) phase and the non\nREM phase, because right nostril/left hemisphere dominance corresponds to\nphases of increased activity (pingala), and left nostril/right hemisphere\ndominance corresponds to rest phases (ida). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; These are the sensations described by yogis, which\naccompany the Kundalini awakening. The 7.3 Hz oscillating current in the sensory\ncortex \u2013 set up by sitting immobile in meditation \u2013 also passes through the\nlimbic system. As the energy flows from the thalamus\nto the cortex and awakens latent or unused parts of the brain (especially in\nthe frontal lobes) the whole brain begins to pulse as a unit generating\ncoherent, high amplitude brain waves within a broad frequency spectrum.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kxr97SdGHug/UMgoyLldimI/AAAAAAAAZfI/kenk8PO71yY/s1600/downloadjkppp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kxr97SdGHug/UMgoyLldimI/AAAAAAAAZfI/kenk8PO71yY/s320/downloadjkppp.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During\nrest maximum amplitude will be in the alpha band but during intense focus high\namplitude beta and gamma waves will prevail, especially in the frontal area.</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\n\u2018condensate\u2019 is a substance whose molecules have a greater order and coherence\nthan normal. In a \u2018Bose-Einstein condensate\u2019 the molecules not only have a high\ndegree of order but they also overlap and the condensate behaves like a unit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples of \u2018Bose-Einstein condensates\u2019 in inorganic matter are superconductors\nand laser beams. By feeding extra energy to the cell walls of living tissue,\nthe cells would line up in the most orderly, condensed way we know \u2013 the\n\u2018Bose-Einstein condensate\u2019 \u2013 and the cell walls would start acting as a unit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5E7DRsRltQs/UMgoC149DBI/AAAAAAAAZeo/JTonYmWCFyg/s1600/imagesjipp%5B.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5E7DRsRltQs/UMgoC149DBI/AAAAAAAAZeo/JTonYmWCFyg/s1600/imagesjipp%5B.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apparently, when the\nbrain is supplied with an extra amount of high grade energy (Kundalini) it\nbecomes a \u2018Bose-Einstein condensate\u2019. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How else can you explain our 7000 year old texts giving the speed of light and the diameters and distances of the planets? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">All our Hindu rosary malas have 108 beads, right-- and this is the numerical&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">equivalent</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;of the Hindu king mantra OM -- its frequency being 7.83 hertz ( Schumann resonance --earth's heart beat ) &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>How did the ancient Hindus Maharishis know all this 11000 years ago--without a laser beam ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Sun's diameter is 108\ntimes that of the earth.&nbsp; The distance\nbetween the Earth and Sun is 108 times the diameter of the Sun .&nbsp; The average distance of the Moon from the\nEarth is 108 times the diameter of the Moon.&nbsp; The radius of the moon is 108 miles.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taking the mean\ndistance between the earth and the Sun ( 149,597,870.691 km) and dividing it by\nthe most commonly used diameter of the Sun (1,392,000 km) the result is -- </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>107.46973469181034482758620689655</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>12 rashis) and 9 navagrahas multiply to 108.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>There are 108 upanishads.\nNataraja's cosmic dance has 108 Bharatanatyam poses. Ayurveda and Kalari talks\nabout 108 marmas. Shiva, Ganesha and Krishna has 108 names. The 108 th and\nheaviest element in the periodic table is Hassium ( 108 protons ) bases on 54\nyin-yang of the Sri yantra ( triple intersections ) and the Sanskrit alphabets . The rest are too short\nlived. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xuRxJuncP3Q/UMhSXg2tY-I/AAAAAAAAZkQ/McW0nqI4uhs/s1600/imagesCAMWQTF4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taking the mean\ndistance from the Moon to the Earth (384,400 km) and dividing it by the Moons\ndiameter (3,474.8 km) results in </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Mean diameter 12,742.02 km<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LXHwX_bkjT0/UMhSgybbU1I/AAAAAAAAZkg/IY-W-VH4aHk/s1600/imagesgjll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bose-Einstein\ncondensate, &nbsp;is named after the Indian scientist\nwho predicted it, Satyendra Nath Bose. &nbsp;Since\nhe was a partner of&nbsp; Albert Einstein, &nbsp;his name is in it too. &nbsp;Bose was denied a Nobel prize, &nbsp;as Indians were at that time made to feel that\nwe are an inferior race\u2014 though every discovery and invention of that Quantum age\n, had its roots in our 7000 year old Vedas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; There is a connection between DNA and\nconsciousness .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain and the DNA are transducers for quantum information\nfrom the scalar field. When a DNA strand is placed in a vacuum, the energy\nemitted by that strand will attract photons which will assume the same shape of\nthe DNA strand, even if the DNA strand is removed later. Quantum coherence in\nthe micro tubules of every cell is the key to consciousness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To become enlightened\nyou have to let go of attachment to all material aspects, which include body,\nmind and emotions . You are entering into unknown fields, yet there is a rock\nof stability and that is your ability to be aware . The more you let go of\nattachment to physical aspects, the more you are guided and the more\nself-sovereign you become. The more you let go, the more aware you become. This\nis truly a journey that everyone must take alone, once you are prepared for the journey, &nbsp;under a guru.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Nadis exist in the etheric body, unseen to the naked eye and\nis based on energy currents, vibration and psychic energy .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Kundalini rises only when the state of purification of the\nnadis and chakras has progressed far enough. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The goal of many of the yoga practices is to purify the\nnadis, and then to cause the prana and apana to meet and rise up through the\nsushumna.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Conscious use of the soham mantra is a tremendous aid in\nbalancing Ida and Pingala.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPunch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SO HAM MANTRA, EXPAND YOUR\nCONSCIOUSNESS - VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAnother method of purifying the nadis and disciplining them\nis by doing Surya Namaskar.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPunch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: red;\">SURYA NAMASKAR, THE 11000 YEAR OLD\nVEDIC SUN SALUTATION - VADAKAYIL</span></b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalancing Ida and Pingala &nbsp;balances the sympathetic and parasympathetic\nbranches of the autonomic nervous system, reducing the elevated flight or fight\nresponse. &nbsp;In other words, the single act\nof balancing the breath is a tremendous aid in physical stress reduction, in\naddition to being a spiritual practice setting the stage for Kundalini\nAwakening. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLike I said before out of these 72,000 subtle nadis only 3\nnadis are very important.&nbsp; They are Ida,\nPingala and Sushumna. &nbsp;The 10 main nadis\nwhich carry prana out of the 72000 are&nbsp;Ida, Pingala, Sushumna, Gandhari, Hastijihva, Pusa, Yusasvini, Alambusa,\nKuhuh and Sankhini .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Ida is feminine ( irrespective of gender ) , left\nsympathetic nervous system, on LH side of spinal cord, &nbsp;tamas- yin negative charge polarity energy, represented\nby cooling moon, connecting to left nostril, controls mental processes, connects\nto RH brain lobe, pale colour<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Pingala is masculine ( irrespective ofgender ) , on RH\nside of spinal cord, &nbsp;rajas-yang positive\ncharge polarity energy , represented by heating sun, connecting to right\nnostril, controls vital processes, connects to RH brain lobe, red colour,<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n&nbsp;Both ida and pingala\nends between the eye brows\u2014at Shiva\u2019s third eye.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ObKLj0z6KSc/UMg54kNql3I/AAAAAAAAZhA/pI0YPwrg_90/s1600/hh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\"
