which interpenetrates the\ncerebrospinal axis from the perineum to the juncture of the lamboid and\nsagittal suture of the cranium, and is associated with both nostrils being\nopen and free to the passage of air. &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSushumna-Sattwa is at the back of the anus, in the middle of\nthe Spinal chord and is the most important of all nadis, neutral charge energy . It is attached to the spinal column and\nextends to the Brahmarandhra of the head and is invisible and subtle.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the\ncoiled-up energy, Kundalini, passes up along the Sushumna Nadi and is taken up\nfrom Chakra to Chakra the Yogi gets different sorts of experiences, powers and\nAnanda ( bliss ). When ida and pingala get balanced and unite in the activated sushumna,\npure consiousness arises. &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIt is only when prana moves into the sushumna that the\nlatent spiritual power of &nbsp;kundalini can\nbe awakened. Kundalaini is the power of pure consciousness, the dynamic\npotential of the soul. It is the Divine Mother Herself, visualized as a serpent\ncoiled three and a half times, with its tail in its mouth.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hNvfnZT1x2s/UMg8pTURKHI/AAAAAAAAZhg/O__AIPTFM_s/s1600/imagesnhyu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hNvfnZT1x2s/UMg8pTURKHI/AAAAAAAAZhg/O__AIPTFM_s/s1600/imagesnhyu.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne of the objects\nof activating the spiral fire and its progress up the spine to the head is to\nawaken the pineal gland, which results in the opening of the third eye and the\nconsequent revelation of the subtler planes of life When it reaches the brain,\nthe yogi is perfectly detached from the body and mind; the soul finds itself\nfree.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAgain, the goal of the sadhaka ( the man who does meditation) in\nhis sadhana (meditating practice) is to bring the hood of the kundalini to\nSahasrara chakra through Sushumna situated in between Ida and Pingala. &nbsp;That is when the hood reaches head or Sahasrara\nchakra, the tail of the 3.5 coiled serpent will reach Mooladharachakra.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhile doing meditation the awakened kundalini should\nraise neither through left side Ida nor through right Pingala but through\ncentre Sushumna nadi only. If not the sadhaka will get traumatic results. The&nbsp; breathing should be slow\nand long. The posture should be straight and erect. internally placing attention\nbetween the eyebrows, making the energies flow evenly between the nostrils.Otherwise\nthe breath will take Ida path or pingala path deviating from Sushumna path.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kY9OAZPGGdw/UMg8J_twV5I/AAAAAAAAZhQ/YPRgqciKkkU/s1600/nadis21.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kY9OAZPGGdw/UMg8J_twV5I/AAAAAAAAZhQ/YPRgqciKkkU/s400/nadis21.jpg\" width=\"321\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIda and pingala function alternately and directly influence\nthe temperature of the body, digestive and hormonal secretions, the brainwaves\nand all the bodily systems. Ida and pingala function according to a natural\ncycle, but on account of poor eating habits, pollution &nbsp;and inharmonious lifestyles, the natural cycle\nis often disturbed.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSometimes one nadi predominates and the other is\nsuppressed. This leads to mental and physical imbalances and generally results\nin disease. Therefore, ida and pingala must be disciplined or made to function\naccording to the laws of nature. Only when there is harmony between these two\nnadis can sushumna be awakened.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen sushumna awakens, kundalini ascends\nstraight to sahasrara and one becomes a jivanmukta, a liberated soul .</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen awakening takes place\nin sushumna, you may feel or see a rod of light, or your spinal cord may seem\nto be fully illumined from within.&nbsp;<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cjerking\u201d that occurs, is an effect of the energy\npulsating through the Sushumna. &nbsp;This movement and sounds of a train in a tunnel signifies the\nmovement of the serpent Shakti towards Shiva. Once attained this you have reached Shiva,\nthe Highest.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FAHPiAUP-vA/UMg8gq30tGI/AAAAAAAAZhY/wlizKM3n_sY/s1600/downloadoobvv.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FAHPiAUP-vA/UMg8gq30tGI/AAAAAAAAZhY/wlizKM3n_sY/s320/downloadoobvv.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"A\nhundred and one are the arteries of the heart, one of them leads up to the\ncrown of the head. Going upward through that, one becomes immortal.\"</span></b></span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(CU 8.6.6) Chandogya Upanishad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">There are two phases of\nkundalini awakening. &nbsp;Only after purification\ncan there be&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">awakening</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; Only by purifying the nadis and awakening the 7 main\nchakras is the kundalini able to rise up through the spine .&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Purification of\nnadis is critical to good health so that a balanced level of prana can flow\nthroughout the nadis and chakra systems.&nbsp;\nImpure nadis cause blockages of the prana and this is what leads to\ndisease in the physical body.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;By purifying you can experience better sense of\nself-control and, overcome anger and resentment to find inner calm and mental\npeace. It strengthens the immune system too and helps you fight off several\ndiseases and keep them at bay. A positive mind is a great weapon against all of\nthem.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When pranayama is\ncorrectly and regularly practiced, it calms and internalized the mind, floods\nthe system with fresh prana, strengthens the organs of the body and purifies\nthe nadis . Pranayama practices, including nadi shodhana, which involves\nalternate breathing through left and right nostrils, which would alternately\nstimulate respectively the left and right sides of the brain. Although we often\nrefer to pranayama as breath control, it actually is the expansion and\nredirection of prana via the medium of breath .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our Vedas Prana-vayu is\nresponsible for inhalation. This form of prana moves between the navel and\nheart and is responsible for the functioning of the heart and lungs. It\ncontrols breathing, swallowing and the circulation of blood..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apana-vayu is\nresponsible for exhalation and is a downward moving current. Its seat is\nbetween the anus and the navel. It controls the functions of the kidneys,\nbowels and bladder and is responsible for excretion, urination, expulsion of\ngas, sexual fluids and childbirth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serious yogis should\nrefrain from eating eat meat, fish or eggs, and avoid all mind-altering drugs\nand alcohol and impure items such as tobacco, onions, garlic, fermented and\nacidic foods , and anything that overloads your system or agitates your mind.\nOccasional fasts are good for the body and mind.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\">THE BEST DAY TO FAST IS THE 3<sup>RD</sup> DAY\nAFTER FULL / NEW MOON</span></span><br />\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For one with a well\nbalanced body and mind, that shift of nostril dominance happens automatically approximately\nonce in ninety minutes. For other people, the shift may be much different.\nSometimes one can be so off balance that one nostril remains dominant, which is\na symptom of some physical, mental, or emotional difficulties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To know more about the\ndirect method of awakening , Pranayama , punch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: red;\">PRANAYAMA \u2013\nVADAKAYIL</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pranayama is a divinely\nrevealed science that improves health, increases vitality, and awakens the\nlatent spiritual energies in the subtle body. Combined with asanas, meditation,\njapa, prayer and devotion, pranayama can quicken our spiritual\nadvancement.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The renowned Hatha-Yoga\nmaster B. K. S. Iyengar has explained the connection between breath control and\nthe elements as follows:</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>In our body we have\nfive elements. The element responsible for production of the elixir of life\n(prana) is earth. The element of air is used as a churning rod, through\ninhalation and exhalation, and distribution is through the element of ether.\nEther is space, and its quality is that it can contract or expand. When you\ninhale, the element of ether expands to take the breath in. In exhalation, the\nether contracts to push out toxins.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Two elements remain:\nwater and fire. If there is a fire, water is used to extinguish it. This gives\nus the idea that fire and water are opposing elements. With the help of the\nelements of earth, air and ether, a friction is created between water and fire,\nwhich not only generates energy but releases it, just as water moving turbines\nin a hydroelectric power station produces electricity.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>To generate electricity,\nthe water has to flow at a certain speed. An inadequate flow will not produce\nelectricity. Similarly, in our system, normal breathing does not produce that\nintense energy. This is why we are all suffering from stress and strain,\ncausing poor circulation which affects our health and happiness. The current is\nnot sufficient so we are merely existing, not living.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>In the practice of\npranayama, we make the breath very long. In this way, the elements of fire and\nwater are brought together, and this contact of fire and water in the body,\nwith the help of the element of air, releases a new energy, called by yogis\ndivine energy, or kundalini shakti, and this is the energy of prana.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nShiva-Samhita(3.26-28), alternate breathing should be performed twenty times\nfour times a day-at dawn, mid-day, sunset, and mid-night. If done regularly for\nthree months, this procedure, we are told, will definitely cleanse the channels.\nIt is only then that the practitioner should turn to breath control proper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-65-bIZd3MJc/UMhKoqS7O3I/AAAAAAAAZjY/4n0EczoNOK8/s1600/imageshkooo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-65-bIZd3MJc/UMhKoqS7O3I/AAAAAAAAZjY/4n0EczoNOK8/s320/imageshkooo.jpg\" width=\"214\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An indirect method of\nawakening the Kundalini for amazing results adopted by Indian yogis is </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>tapasya</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\nwhich means the performance of severe penances and austerities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These yogis do NO wear clothes and cover\nthemselves with ashes. &nbsp;Tapasya&nbsp;&nbsp; is&nbsp;&nbsp;\na&nbsp;&nbsp; means&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp;\npurification. Through this process the mind, the emotions and the whole\npersonality are cleansed of all the dirt, complexes and patterns of behavior\nthat cause pain and suffering. &nbsp;Bad\nhabits, vices are uprooted and destroyed at its psychic root,&nbsp; not only at the conscious level.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tapasya is a\npsychological or psycho-emotional process through which the aspirant tries&nbsp;&nbsp; to&nbsp;&nbsp;\nset&nbsp;&nbsp; in&nbsp;&nbsp; motion&nbsp;&nbsp;\na&nbsp;&nbsp; process&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmetabolism&nbsp;&nbsp; that&nbsp;&nbsp; will&nbsp;&nbsp;\neradicate&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; habits&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthat&nbsp;&nbsp; create weakness and\nobstruct the awakening of willpower. &nbsp;This\nstrength of will is the fruit of tapasya. &nbsp;Once you achieve a balanced mind in the face\nof mental and emotional conflicts and you can endure anger, worry, love and\npassion, disappointment, jealousy, hatred, memories of the past, sufferings and\nsorrows, you are ready for the awakening. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such sadhus live in seclusion because when\nthere are interactions with people, so many thought currents move in the mind. &nbsp;Mixing with people, talking and gossiping\ncreate crosscurrents of love, hatred, infatuation, jealousy, likes and\ndislikes, restlessness, worry , desires and passions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you do NOT have any\ninteraction with people, you will be spared a lot of mental turmoil. &nbsp;You will &nbsp;have&nbsp;NIL psychological cobwebs. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">He is also ready for the vairagya or\ndetachment that will come to him as a result of the awakening of kundalini.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-S3LeXNNIL3o/UMhKh3QH_BI/AAAAAAAAZjQ/eSRUHpjXHXU/s1600/kl'%5D.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"219\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-S3LeXNNIL3o/UMhKh3QH_BI/AAAAAAAAZjQ/eSRUHpjXHXU/s320/kl'%5D.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These yogis practice &nbsp;Hatha-Yoga. The Gheranda-Samhita (5.36)\ndistinguishes between two basic types of purification practices: samanu and\nnirmanu, which terms denote \"mental\" and \"nonmental\"\nrespectively. I will discuss the latter first.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As this text explains,\nit consists in physical cleansing processes called dhauti, comprising the\nfollowing techniques:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. antar-dhauti\n(\"inner cleansing\") consisting of the following four techniques:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(a) vata-sara\n(\"air process\"), which is done by inhaling through the mouth and\nexpelling the air through the lower passage;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(b) vari-sara\n(\"water process\"), which is done by sipping water until the stomach\nis completely filled and expelling it through the lower passage;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(c) vahni-sara\n(\"fire process\"), which is done by pushing the navel one hundred\ntimes back toward the spine, which increased the \"gastric fire\";<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(d) bahish-krita\n(\"external action\"), which is done by sucking in air through the\nmouth until the stomach is filled, retaining it for ninety minutes, and then\nexpelling it through the lower passage; this is followed by one's standing in\nnavel-deep water and pushing out the lower intestinal tract for cleansing\u2014I do\nhope you understand what this means.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. danta-dhauti\n(\"dental cleansing\"), which includes cleaning the teeth, the tongue,\nas well as the ears and frontal sinuses;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. hrid-dhauti\n(\"lit. \"heart cleansing\"), which consists of (a) introducing the\nstalk of a plantain, turmeric, or cane into the throat to clean it out; (b)\nfilling the stomach with water and then expelling it through the mouth; (c)\nswallowing a long strip of thin cloth and then pulling it out again (a process\ncalled v\u0432so-dhauti, \"cloth cleansing\");<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. mula-shodhana\n(\"rectal cleansing\"), which is done by means of turmeric, water, or\nthe middle finger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blissful sex or drinking Soma and\nraising Kundalini in 3 seconds would have been much easier , right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Shiva-Samhita (3.31-32) also states that when the nadis have been purified, certain signs\nwill manifest: The body becomes harmonious (sama) and beautiful, and emits a\npleasant scent, while the voice becomes resonant and the appetite increases.\nAlso, the yogin whose subtle pathways are thoroughly cleansed is always\n\"full-hearted,\" energetic, and strong. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nHatha-Yoga-Prad\u043epika (2.19) mentions leanness and brightness of the body as\nindications of a purified nadi system. Now the practitioner is like a finely\ntuned instrument and ready to engage the higher processes of Tantra, leading to\nthe activation of the serpent power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--kfbcleb7DM/UMhdo2xuexI/AAAAAAAAZlY/0FykxIQ2HpY/s1600/imageshkll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--kfbcleb7DM/UMhdo2xuexI/AAAAAAAAZlY/0FykxIQ2HpY/s1600/imageshkll.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The psychic symbol for</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>\nmooladhara Chakra</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> is a deep red, four-petalled lotus. &nbsp;Inside there is a smoky lingam around which a\nsnake is coiled three and a half times with its head facing in a dormant or\nsleeping state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On each petal is a letter: vam, sham,\nsham, sam, written in gold. In the pericarp is a yellow square, symbol of the\nearth element, surrounded by eight golden spears - four at each corner and four\nat the cardinal points.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In tantra this coiled serpent is known as mahakala,\ngreat or endless time. Here kundalini is lying in the womb of the unconscious,\nbeyond time and space. When kundalini begins to manifest, it enters the\ndimensions of personality and individuality, and becomes subject to time and\nspace.&nbsp; That is the awakening of the\ngreat serpent power within the individual form, frame and consciousness of the\nhuman being.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, inmost people it is dormant. In its awakened state\nkundaiini shakti represents our spiritual potential, but in its dormant state\nit represents that instinctive level of life which supports our basic existence\nMooladhara awakening is often accompanied by itchy sensations around the coccyx\nor anus, and the sense of smell becomes so acute that offensive odors are\ndifficult to bear. When the positive and negative forces of ida and pingala are\ncompletely balanced, an awakening is sparked off here which arouses the dormant\nkundalini.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DWFW4Ok4ZdU/UMhdsirDEfI/AAAAAAAAZlg/r4fhPLls-24/s1600/imagesm,kk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DWFW4Ok4ZdU/UMhdsirDEfI/AAAAAAAAZlg/r4fhPLls-24/s1600/imagesm,kk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the female body its\nlocation is at the root of the uterus, in the posterior side of the cervix &nbsp;Mooladhara is the first center in human\nincarnation, but it is the highest chakra that animals have the capacity to\nawaken. &nbsp;It is their sahasrara. The\nhigher chakras beyond mooladhara are not present in the psychic physiology of\nanimals and their nervous systems reflect this relative deficiency. I wonder of\nCharles Darwrin ever knew of consciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below mooladhara there\nare other chakras which represent the evolution of the animal kingdom. They are\nonly related to sense consciousness and not to mental awareness The names of\nthe lower chakras are atala, vitala, sutala, talatala, rasatala, mahatala\nand&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; lowest&nbsp;&nbsp;\nis patala. Just as mooladhara is the lowest chakra in the human body,\npatala is the lowest in the animal kingdom. It is the dimension which\nrepresents total darkness, where nature is not functioning and matter is\ncompletely dormant and static.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sahasrara is the\nhighest in human evolution. &nbsp;Up to\nmooladhara chakra evolution takes place automatically. Animals do not have to practise\npranayama and japa yoga Because they don't think, nature is benevolently responsible\nfor every phase of their evolution. However, once kundalini reaches mooladhara\nchakra, evolution is no longer spontaneous, because a human being is not\ncompletely subjected to the laws of nature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-epk4y1EH_sw/UMhd455LbBI/AAAAAAAAZlo/XzqsUwfIWHI/s1600/imagesbhuuu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-epk4y1EH_sw/UMhd455LbBI/AAAAAAAAZlo/XzqsUwfIWHI/s640/imagesbhuuu.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, animals only mate in\nparticular seasons. At other times, even if they live together they will not\nmate. But, because man is free from the laws of nature, he can mate whenever he\nwants. Conscious creatures can see themselves in the mirror\u2014only humans and\nelephants can do that. Few creatures like chimps, bonobos and dolphins are\npartially conscious. This is why dolphins and bonobos have sex for pleasure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Man has awareness of\ntime and space, and he has an ego. He can think, he can know that he is\nthinking and he can know that he knows that he is thinking. This is because of the\nevolution of ego. If there is no ego there will not be double awareness.\nAnimals do not have double awareness. If a dog is chasing another dog, it is\nunder nature's compulsion. It doesn't know it is chasing and the other dog\ndoesn't know that it is running. It runs because instinct compels it to.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That\nis why it is said that kundalini is sleeping in mooladhara chakra. It can't progress\nbeyond this point unless it is pushed and prodded . Sometimes it even ascends to\nswadhisthana or manipura via ida or pingala nadis to find it blocked only get\nangry attack these centres and to return to mooladhara again to sleep.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, once the shakti goes beyond manipura\nchakra via sushumna nadi there is no going back.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the inner aspect\nof that nerve complex which carries all kinds of sensations and is immediately\nconnected with the testes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both the male and\nfemale bodies, there is a vestigial gland at mooladhara chakra which is\nsomething like a knot. &nbsp;In Sanskrit this\nis known as brahma granthi; the knot of Brahma. As long as this knot remains\nintact, the energy located in this area is blocked. But the moment the knot is\nopened, shakti awakens.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is only when the individual awakens to the\npossibility of divine consciousness, to a greater force and purpose than that\nof instinctive animal life, that the brahma granthi begins to loosen.\nConsciousness begins to be liberated from the root center as the individual's\naspiration awakens. Just because mooladhara is situated near your asshole ,\nthis does not make it an impure center. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp;\npassions&nbsp;&nbsp; are&nbsp;&nbsp; stored&nbsp;&nbsp;\ninmooladhara, all the guilt, every complex and every agony has its root\nin mooladhara chakra. &nbsp;Man's life, his\ndesires, his actions and his accomplishments, are controlled by the sexual&nbsp;&nbsp; desires,&nbsp;&nbsp;\nand&nbsp;&nbsp; whatever&nbsp;&nbsp; we&nbsp;&nbsp;\ndo&nbsp;&nbsp; in&nbsp;&nbsp; life&nbsp;&nbsp;\nis&nbsp;&nbsp; an&nbsp;&nbsp; expression&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof&nbsp;&nbsp; that&nbsp;&nbsp; lower&nbsp;&nbsp;\nchakra . Our lower samskaras and karmas are embedded there, as in lower\nincarnations, one's whole being is founded on the sexual personality. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5UfuMD5C6ic/UMheAkyGO_I/AAAAAAAAZlw/mG83nyukd0Q/s1600/ghjkkk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"296\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5UfuMD5C6ic/UMheAkyGO_I/AAAAAAAAZlw/mG83nyukd0Q/s320/ghjkkk.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr.\nSigmund Freud has also emphasized this point. He said that one's selection of\nclothing, food, friends, home furnishing and decor, etc., everything is\ninfluenced by his sexual awareness. &nbsp;Sexual\nfulfillment and sexual frustrations control our life. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If sexual urges are removed from life,\neverything will change. Often we react to sexual life on account of bitter experiences\nand we vow not to follow the same path again. We are fed up and on account of\nthat we say, 'No more'. &nbsp;But this is no\nsolution, it's only a reaction and not the permanent structure of our mind . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When mooladhara\nawakens, a number of phenomena occur. The first thing many practitioners\nexperience is levitation of the astral body. One has the sensation of floating upward\nin space, leaving the physical body behind. This is due to the energy of\nkundaiini whose ascending momentum causes the astral body to disassociate from\nthe physical and move upward.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E6o6danhNMo/UMheVEvssVI/AAAAAAAAZl4/8F-t7XDm5zI/s1600/eeee.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E6o6danhNMo/UMheVEvssVI/AAAAAAAAZl4/8F-t7XDm5zI/s1600/eeee.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">This phenomenon is limited to the astral and\npossibly mental dimensions, and this differs from what is normally called\nlevitation - the actual displacement of the physical body. Sometimes we see morons trying to physically fly in videos on the Internet by flexing their ass muscles -- this is is rock bottom ( or Mooladhara ) of ignorance and the&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">height</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;of stupidity..<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SEcOZprUxDk/UMi6WFL7pqI/AAAAAAAAZmw/45IbhcKIpNQ/s1600/nkl;'.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SEcOZprUxDk/UMi6WFL7pqI/AAAAAAAAZmw/45IbhcKIpNQ/s320/nkl;'.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp;&nbsp; power&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; chakras&nbsp;&nbsp;\ndoes&nbsp;&nbsp; not&nbsp;&nbsp; reside&nbsp;&nbsp;\nin&nbsp;&nbsp; the chakras themselves, but\nin sahasrara. The chakras are only transducers . &nbsp;It is only when kundalini reaches ajna chakra\nthat the transcendence begins. &nbsp;All the\npotential lies in sahasrara. The literal meaning of the word sahasrara is 'one\nthousand'. For this reason it is said to be a lotus with one thousand petals. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sahasrara is the\nculmination of yoga, the perfect union between shiva and Shakti and the\nunfolding of enlightenment.&nbsp;&nbsp; When this\nunion takes place, the moment of self-realization or samadhi begins. At this\npoint the individual man dies. &nbsp;I don't\nmean that physical death occurs, it is death of the mundane awareness or individual\nawareness. &nbsp;It is death of the experience\nof name and form. At this time you don't&nbsp;&nbsp;\nremember&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; 'I',&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp; 'you'&nbsp;&nbsp; or&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp; 'they'.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-q85BMPwQG1g/UMi6ce4DUfI/AAAAAAAAZm4/gp6GGpFRV2Y/s1600/imageskl;.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-q85BMPwQG1g/UMi6ce4DUfI/AAAAAAAAZm4/gp6GGpFRV2Y/s1600/imageskl;.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp;&nbsp; experience,&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp; experienced&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthe experiencer are one and the same. The seer, seeing and and seen are\nmerged as a unified whole. In other words, there is no multiple or dual\nawareness. There is only single awareness. When Shiva and Shakti unite, nothing\nremains, there is absolute silence. Shakti does not remain Shakti and Shiva is\nno more Shiva, both are mingled into one and they can no longer be identified\nas two different forces. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In due course the Kundalini\nenergy comes down, ideally taking residence in the heart anahata chakra, &nbsp;balancing upper and lower chakras. &nbsp;You live a normal life, associating with\neverybody and discharging your worldly obligations like other people do.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now you are in the midst of games of victory and\ndefeat, &nbsp;attachments and infatuations, &nbsp;but you just play a game. &nbsp;You know it; you do everything as an actor. &nbsp;You are not involved in it life and soul .&nbsp; People recognize you as a divine incarnation reality.\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lLFPJ9ULU8o/UMi6jtJbbtI/AAAAAAAAZnA/toNMndtToak/s1600/downloadbml;.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lLFPJ9ULU8o/UMi6jtJbbtI/AAAAAAAAZnA/toNMndtToak/s400/downloadbml;.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Shiva and Shakti descend to the\ngross level of awareness there is again duality. That is why the self-realized\nman is able to understand pain and all the mundane affairs of life. &nbsp;He understands the whole drama of duality,\nmultiplicity and diversity. &nbsp;Sometimes we\nordinary mortals are at a fix to understand how this man with the highest\nattainment is able to cope with the hopeless dualities of life. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Wjm-jkACL0w/UMi68yHMA1I/AAAAAAAAZnI/PStG45AdIO0/s1600/downloadghj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Wjm-jkACL0w/UMi68yHMA1I/AAAAAAAAZnI/PStG45AdIO0/s1600/downloadghj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shakti rules the matter and Shiva rules the\nconsciousness, and when they descend to the gross plane, Shakti continues to\nrule the matter and Shiva, being consciousness, gives an understanding to the\nwhole world.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Rxz4I7I2gUE/UMjDZwEv3dI/AAAAAAAAZoU/8SUf8evpmvY/s1600/imagesioo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Rxz4I7I2gUE/UMjDZwEv3dI/AAAAAAAAZoU/8SUf8evpmvY/s320/imagesioo.jpg\" width=\"259\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are three\nchannels through which the spiritual energies of the kundalini can rise. The\none recommended is the sushumna. The other two are to be avoided. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very important\nthat you awaken sushumna before attempting to raise the kundalini\u2014by balancing\nthe ida and pingala nadis..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the systematic\nprocess of awakening kundalini, &nbsp;the\nfirst step is to purify and balance ida and pingala nadis and create harmony in\ntheir functioning. &nbsp;Next, all the chakras\nhave to be awakened. Then sushumna nadi is awakened, and when there is a clear\npathway for its ascent, only then kundalini can be awakened. This is the reason\nwhy it must be done under a qualified guru.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the kundalini shakti\nflows outside of the sushumna nadi into and through the ida nadi on the left\nside of the spine, which corresponds to the left sympathetic nerve system, it\nis fragmented into other smaller and more sensitive nerve currents connected to\nthe organs of the physical body.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It produces heat within this formerly cool\nnadi network. The person becomes overly emotional, feminine in nature, talks a\nlot, often has hurt feelings, cries at the least provocation and engages in\nother emotional behavior patterns that center around the personal I-ness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the serpent power\nflows up through the pingala nadi and into the sympathetic nerve network on the\nright side of the body, the person becomes overly intellectual, very masculine\nin nature, talks little, &nbsp;has steel\nnerves and patterns centering around the conquest of others through\nintellectual debate. &nbsp;He is prone to long\nsilences, holding in emotions, and to secret patterns of behavior to stimulate\nor satisfy base desires. &nbsp;In other words,\nhe is not open, smiling, friendly, companionable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In either case, the\nkundalini shakti rising through the ida or pingala can move upward only to the manipura\nchakra and no farther. This is the impasse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the Kundalini shakti\nmoves through either of the other of the two wrong channels, it will produce acute\ndiscomfort, physically, emotionally, intellectually and astrally -- that no Western\ndoctor's effort can fathom the cause of , or effect a cure. &nbsp;Western medicine is presently not equipped to\nhandle these problems . The psychological symptoms tend to mimic schizophrenia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very likely, therefore, that such individuals may be diagnosed as\nschizophrenics and be either institutionalized for madness or given very\ndrastic and unwarranted treatment. &nbsp;As\nlong as we look at the symptom only and not the cause, which is only expressed\nin the physical, emotional and mental bodies, the treatment will be inadequate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Billions of nervous\nconnections can \u2018burn\u2019 and dissolve, leading to mental illness, symptoms of\nstrokes or multiple sclerosis. &nbsp;Such\naccidents usually are the consequences of a premature Kundalini awakening due\nto modern drugs like LSD, DMT, Ecstasy or others. If the nervous system is not\nready to handle a sudden \u2018power surge\u2019 of cosmic magnitude, the awakening can\nresult in serious damage to the body, especially the brain .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, when\nKundalini awakens naturally, self-regulating systems within the body harmoniously\ncontrol and limit the amount of electricity released. &nbsp;As a result of this filtering mechanism, the\nnervous system progressively adjusts to the extra power, rather than\nself-destructing. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Kundalini\nawakens it may stir up a lot of repressed feelings and traumas from the\nunconscious and cause considerable anguish and pain in the individual. &nbsp;Grown ups adults will cry uncontrollably. &nbsp;A premature Kundalini awakening too may cause\npsychotic episodes in individuals with severe early traumas. Such traumas are\nusually associated with serious organic or biological disturbances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WyGqDp9fxR0/UMjDSI7uh0I/AAAAAAAAZoE/3s-iQJp1pXo/s1600/kkjj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"282\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WyGqDp9fxR0/UMjDSI7uh0I/AAAAAAAAZoE/3s-iQJp1pXo/s320/kkjj.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the preparation is\ninsufficient, at various junctures, as it rises, the kundalini shakti, or\nserpent power, attacks the organs in the vicinity of the chakra it is passing\nthrough, biting and poisoning them on the astral level. The poison flows\nthrough all organs, temporary physical, mental and emotional suffering is the\nconsequence .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As it climbs, each one of the astral organs is hurt and felt as a\nphysical ailment. This often reflects as a symptomatic problem in the kidneys,\nthen stomach problems and later heart problems and thyroid difficulties. At\neach juncture, the western doctor would be perplexed by the ailment, unable to\nfind a medical cause, then doubly perplexed when that problem disappears\nsuddenly and the next new one arises. &nbsp;Though\ntreatments and multiple tests are more than often given, the source of the\nproblems is usually undetected. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everyone is craving\nkundalini awakening, but few people have the discipline and mental, emotional,\nphysical and nervous preparation required to avoid damage to the brain and\ntissues. If ever you become scared and want to stop the process of kundalini\nawakening, all you have to do is revert to a gross lifestyle. &nbsp;Just revise all your base passions, cunning dreams\nand worldly ambitions . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kundalini can\nremain stuck in one chakra for many years. Sometimes, when kundalini gets\nblocked in a chakra during transit, &nbsp;you\nbegin to exhibit some of the siddhis or psychic powers associated with that\nchakra. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again , never attempt to\nactivate or raise Kundalini without a guru. &nbsp;Attempting to raise alone could cause\npermanent mental damage. Kundalini is for ADULT energy bodies only - no\nchildren are allowed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\nTo know more about chakras -<br />\n<br />\nPunch into Google search&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHAKRA VORTEX , SCALAR ENERGY TRANSCEIVER - VADAKAYIL</span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3fxz8xa5Npg/UMjOFZwPUAI/AAAAAAAAZpY/ssTvspYiM5Q/s1600/Chakra-Chart2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"clear: right;
