background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\"> </span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red; font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , sans-serif;\">\u0628\u06d2</span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\"> </span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red; font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , sans-serif;\">\u062a\u062c\u0644\u06cc</span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\"> </span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red; font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , sans-serif;\">\u0648\u06c1</span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\"> </span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red; font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , sans-serif;\">\u0635\u0644\u06cc\u0628</span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\"> </span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red; font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , sans-serif;\">\u06a9\u062a</span><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\">&nbsp;[]<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; color: red;\">He\na Moses without divine manifestation; he a Christ without a Cross? The discussion that went on\nbetween Lenin, God, and the angels during their meeting is spread over three\npoems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the first poem,\n\u201cLenin before God\u201d, Lenin acknowledges the presence of God in the \u201cnature\u2019s\ninfinite music\u201d. With remarkable honesty, Lenin proceeds to describe the\nsituation on Earth to God. Here, instead of flattering the Deity, Lenin files\nhis complaint:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is the Khilafat\nmovement?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Khilafat was not a\nreligious movement or a fight for Indian independence, but rather a show of\nsolidarity by Indian Muslims with their fellow Muslims in Turkey. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ottoman emperor Abdul Hamid II (1876\u20131909) </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">sent an emissary, Jamaluddin Afghani, to India\nin the late 19th century.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cause of the Caliph evoked religious passion and\nsympathy amongst Indian Muslims as they considered him to be the supreme\nreligious and political leader of all Muslims across the world,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It had nothing to do\nwith India. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Caliphate was an\nIslamic system of governance in which the state rules under Islamic law.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindus under Gandhi\nsupported the Khilafat movement and this amazingly strong Hindu Muslim unity upset\nRothchild, &nbsp;the Jew. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Khilafat Movement\nthreatened to topple the entire system of European political secularism and\nconstitutional democracy that the colonial West was forcing upon the colonized\nnon-European world. &nbsp;A British strategy was devised, in collaboration with\nMustafa Kamal\u2019s newly emergent secular Republic of Turkey, to abolish the\nOttoman Turkish Caliphate, and in so doing to sabotage and to bring about the\ncollapse of the Indian Khilafat Movement with its alarming anti-white invader Hindu-Muslim\nIndian DNA alliance. The strategy succeeded with Iqbal's shrewd connivance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the last nail\ndriven into the coffin of the Ottoman empire, the Caliphate was abolished in\nTurkey. The old Indian Muslim leadership, comprised of men who knew and lived\nIslam, went into irreversible decline. They were replaced at the helm of\naffairs by the secularly inclined <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Rothschild created \u2018All India Muslim League\u2019</span></b>, &nbsp;monolopized by men with western education and westernized thought.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\npresided over the cleverly disguised passage from Islam as the basis of\npolitical culture, to a new European-inspired political culture and conception\nof a modern state. It was deceptively spirited in by way of religious\nnationalism, and emerged as a curious creature named \u2018Muslim nationalism\u2019.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\npassage from the one to the other was so cleverly disguised that it is still\nnot discernible even to intellectual Muslims in India, Pakistan and Bangladesh .\n&nbsp;Iqbal had proclaimed that Islam is a\nbranch of the original religion of Judaism \u2013 of Abraham, Moses, David, Solomon,\nand Jesus.</span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Iqbal , the double\nagent, presided over the destruction of the Islamic Caliphate and the\ndismemberment of the Ottoman Islamic State and its replacement by the secular <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cmade-by\nRothschild\u201d &nbsp;Republic of Turkey</span>. For this\na grateful Rothschild gave Iqbal the Nobel prize in 1922.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Something more about the widely&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">misunderstood</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Khilafat movement.</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The general impression\namong the Muslims of India was that the western Christain and Jew powers were\nwaging a war against Islam throughout the world in order to rob it of all its\npower and influence. The Ottoman Empire was the only Muslim power that had\nmaintained a semblance of authority and the Muslims of India wanted to save the\nIslamic political power from extinction. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Turkish Sultans had claimed to be the\ncaliphs of the Muslim world. As long as the Mughal Empire had been in\nexistence, the Muslims of India had not recognized their claim. At this\ncritical juncture, when the Muslims of the Sub-continent had no sovereign ruler\nof their own, they began to see the necessity of recognizing the Sultan of\nTurkey as their caliph. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tipu Sultan was\nthe first Indian Muslim who, having been frustrated in his attempts to gain\nrecognition from the Mughals, had turned to the Sultan of Turkey to establish a\nlegal right to his throne.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mohammad Ali and his\nbrother Maulana Shaukat Ali joined with other Muslim leaders such as Sheikh\nShaukat Ali Siddiqui, Dr. Mukhtar Ahmed Ansari, Raees-Ul-Muhajireen Barrister\nJan Muhammad Junejo, Hasrat Mohani, Syed Ata Ullah Shah Bukhari, Maulana Abul\nKalam Azad and Dr. Hakim Ajmal Khan to form the All India Khilafat Committee.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The organization was based in Lucknow, India at Hathe Shaukat Ali, the compound\nof Landlord Shaukat Ali Siddiqui. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\n1920 an alliance was made between Khilafat leaders and the Indian National\nCongress, the largest political party in India and of the nationalist movement.\nCongress and Khilafat leaders promised to work and fight together for the\ncauses of Khilafat and Swaraj. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seeking\nto increase pressure on the British, the Khilafatists became a major part of\nthe Non-cooperation movement \u2014 a nationwide campaign of mass, peaceful civil\ndisobedience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The support of the Khilafatists ensure Hindu-Muslim unity during\nthe struggle. The non-cooperation campaign was at first successful. Massive\nprotests, strikes and acts of civil disobedience spread across India. Hindus\nand Muslims collectively offered resistance, which was largely peaceful.\nGandhi, the Ali brothers and others were imprisoned by the British.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">The\nKhilafat campaign was opposed by the Muslim League under Iqbal.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ever since he came back\nfrom abroad till Rothschild stooge Kemal took over the Republic of Turkey, Iqbal took no active\npart in Indian politics. &nbsp;He did NOT\nspend a single minute fighting for freedom. He refused point blank to serve on\nthe Khilafat Committee, giving a lame excuse that he did not favour the methods\nadopted by the sponsors of the Khilafat Movement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While he was in jail in\n1932, even Gandhi declared that Iqbal had become anti-nationalist. After going\nthrough an account of Iqbal's speech to the Muslim League published in the\nnewspaper, he commented: \"Other Muslims too share Iqbal's\nanti-nationalism; only they do not give expression to their sentiments. The\npoet now disowns his song Hindustan Hamara (India is Ours).\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ali\nbrothers (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maulanas Muhammad Ali\nand Shaukat Ali)&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">regarded by Muslims , as founding-fathers of Pakistan criticised\nGandhi's extreme and ridiculous commitment to non-violence after he suspended this\nnon-cooperation movement after the killing of 23 policemen at Chauri Chaura in\n1922, as per Rothschild\u2019s wishes.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ijwFUrvmEro/UL28IAnzcfI/AAAAAAAAZLQ/WwnKUQygyGU/s1600/hjll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"213\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ijwFUrvmEro/UL28IAnzcfI/AAAAAAAAZLQ/WwnKUQygyGU/s320/hjll.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For, this was the condition upon which Gandhi\nwas imported from South Africa to India by Rothschild (using Gokhale) and\nconverted into a Mahatma. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freedom fighting Hindus\nand </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims were aghast </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">that Gandhi betrayed their revolution by\ncalling it off just when they had finally some hope of success.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was the first\nnation-wide Hindu-Muslim JOINT movement since the First War of Independence in 1857.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire bottom fell\nout of the historic Khilafat movement ( and with it the Swaraj movement ) when\nthe Turks under the leadership of Rothschild stooge Kemal Ataturk decided to\nabolish the caliphate and declared themselves a republic.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi would now make Indians fight the Second World War for Rothschild, to carve out the state of Israel and 2.43 lakh ( 243,000 ) Indian soldiers would be killed in the worst and most dangerous areas of war.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO taking away the fact that Iqbal was a brilliant poet--in my opinion, much better than Rabindranath Tagore.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iqbal's poetic works\nare written primarily in Persian rather than Urdu. Among his 12,000 verses of\npoetry, about 7,000 verses are in Persian.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me put down our Indian National song for you--penned by Iqbal.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u093e\u0930\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091c\u0939\u093e\u0901</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093e\u092e</span>-<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0913</span>-<span style=\"font-family: dard-e nih\u0101\u00f1 ham\u0101r\u0101!<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n[edit]Translation<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Better than the entire world, is our Hindustan,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">We are its nightingales, and it (is) our garden abode</span></b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf we are in an alien place, the heart remains in the\nhomeland,<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKnow us to be only there where our heart is.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">That tallest mountain, that shade-sharer of the sky,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">It (is) our sentry, it (is) our watchman<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">In its lap frolic those thousands of rivers,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Whose vitality makes our garden the envy of Paradise.</span></b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nO the flowing waters of the Ganges, do you remember that day<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen our caravan first disembarked on your waterfront?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Religion does not teach us to bear ill-will among ourselves<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">We are of Hind, our homeland is Hindustan.</span></b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn a world in which ancient Greece, Egypt, and Rome have all\nvanished without trace<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOur own attributes (name and sign) live on today.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSuch is our existence that it cannot be erased<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEven though, for centuries, the cycle of time has been our\nenemy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIqbal! We have no confidant in this world<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhat does any one know of our hidden pain?<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/W1R7Yr10RJI/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/W1R7Yr10RJI&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/W1R7Yr10RJI&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild used BR\nAmbedkar and Iqbal worked in tandem to drive fissures into Indian society, by\nreligion, catse , creed etc. Both of them had written and declared openly that\nIndia is better off under British rule.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a dialogue with Dr. B. R. Ambedkar, &nbsp;Iqbal had expressed his desire to see Indian\nprovinces as autonomous units under the direct control of the British\ngovernment and with no central Indian government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iqbal is the national\npoet , national philosopher , &nbsp;and spiritual father of\nPakistan. He is also known as Allama Iqbal ( Muslim scholar ) , the Shair-e-Mashriq &nbsp;(Poet of the East), &nbsp;Muffakir-e-Pakistan (The Thinker of Pakistan) ,\nHakeem-ul-Ummat (The Sage of the Ummah) ,<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Qaomi Shayer\u2019 (The National Poet),\n\u2018Hakeem-ul-Umat\u2019 (The Genius of Muslim Community), \u2018Musawir-e-Pakistan\u2019 (The Artist of Pakistan), \u2018Mufaqir-e-Pakistan\u2019\n(Ideological Founder of Pakistan).</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was the political\nmentor of Mohammed Ali Jinnah.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Building\na strong, &nbsp;personal rappot with Jinnah,\nIqbal was an influential force in convincing Jinnah to end his self-imposed\nexile in London, return to India and take charge of the Muslim League, and work\non the two nation theory. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This theory\nwas NOT Jinnah\u2019s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-A-5KqHeDpTo/UL3WMlqfrNI/AAAAAAAAZM4/QE1rjw4qNvw/s1600/418px-Miqbal4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-A-5KqHeDpTo/UL3WMlqfrNI/AAAAAAAAZM4/QE1rjw4qNvw/s320/418px-Miqbal4.jpg\" width=\"223\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His seminal 1930\npresidential speech to the Muslim League in Allahabad lay the foundation stone\nof the new country that was yet to be.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHe did not live to see Pakistan\u2019s creation , as he died in 1938, yet\nwhat may be called the \u201cPakistan Principle\u201d was captured in his words:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI would like to see\nthe Punjab, Northwest Frontier Province, Sind and Baluchistan amalgamated into\na single state. Self-government within the British Empire or without the\nBritish Empire, the formation of a consolidated North West Indian Muslim state\nappears to me to be the final destiny of the Muslims at least of Northwest\nIndia\u2026 India is the greatest Muslim country in the world.&nbsp; The life of Islam as a cultural force in this\nliving country very largely depends on its centralization in a specified territory\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iqbal\u2019s birthday is\nannually commemorated in Pakistan as Iqbal Day, a national holiday. &nbsp;Like for Gandhi in India Iqbal\u2019s name is\nassociated with many structures , like &nbsp;Iqbal\nStadium in Faisalabad, Allama Iqbal Open University in Pakistan, the Allama\nIqbal International Airport in Lahore etc. His son Javid Iqbal has served as a\njustice on the Supreme Court of Pakistan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is on record that he\nhad 3 official wives, several mistresses (one of which was attractive Atiyai Faizi ) and of course his German honeypot with\nwhom he corresponded for many years by letters.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">In November 1917 British Foreign Secretary, Arthur Balfour, the\nPM of England and the President of USA were USED by their master Lord\nRothschild to carve out a homeland for the Jews in Palestine.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nRothschild\u2019s own puppet agency the League of Nations, in\nJuly 1922 , &nbsp;gave its official blessings\nto the mandate forged clandestinely be the Allies and World Zionism. Jewish\nimmigrant hordes were pouring into Palestine and the Arab land was being seized\nand auctioned under the aegis of the mandatory Britain and in the name of\nagriculture and colonization.\u2019<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIqbal was Rothschild\u2019s DOUBLE AGENT. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIt was he who kept repeating to the Muslim world that Jews\nhad vacated Israel long ago and this area was occupied by Muslims.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nListen\u2014all ye Muslims.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI am from Calicut in Kerala , India. &nbsp;The king of Calicut have been giving refuge to all Jews who were persecuted before Christ was born. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTake this from me-- a person who has perception.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Judean Jews looked like the present day Jordanians and\nthe present day Muslims in Palestine. The Jews you see in Israel today are NOT\nJudean descendants. &nbsp;They are from the\nGeorgia Khazar area.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Just because a person is a Jew it does NOT make him a\nJudean.</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>In that case Indonesians must drive away Saudis from Mecca, and settle there \u2014just\nbecause they are Muslim.</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIqbal assumed spiritual leadership ( as an agent and stooge\nof Rothschild ) of the &nbsp;high-powered\nIndian Muslim delegation to the Al-Aqsa Islamic Conference held in Jerusalem in\n1930.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\nThere was NOT a single Muslim who had the wisdom to cry out -\"Listen we expect a poet like Iqbal to provide motivational fire, NOT take over the reins of our political negotiations\"&nbsp;</div>\n<table align=\"center\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"tr-caption-container\" style=\"margin-left: auto; They will know if they wish to open their eyes that Iqbal just\nlet the Palestinians down, wholesale--.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TOTAL &nbsp;BREACH &nbsp;OF &nbsp;TRUST !&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIt is difficult\nto wake up people pretending to sleep.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">NAZIS WERE MORE\nCULTURED AND KINDER- VADAKAYIL</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\nand<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THE TEARS OF PALESTINE- VADAKAYIL</span></b><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you put Ashwini Nachappa in Google search , you will find that all posts describe that she beat PT Usha twice-- in some insignificant bullshit meet, &nbsp;probably when she was having her periods. This is her claim to fame, in addition to her tight and revealing outfits. &nbsp; PT Usha's 400 metres hurdles National record still stands after 3 decades.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same way, you will find every biography of Iqbal , emphasizing that his forefathers were Hindu Kashmiri Brahmins. INCLUDING PATRON FOUNDER SIR SYED AHMAN KHAN WHO WAS AN AGENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS JEW AGENTS HIS HIGHNESS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN AND AGHA KHAN III</span></b>&nbsp;AS FRONTS FOR FUND COLLECTION AND TO DO PROPAGANDA FOR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD MADE CRYPTO JEW SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE CONFERENCES FOR MORE THAN A DECADE.. HE WAS THE FIRST VC OF AMU..<br />\n<br />\nJEW SIR AGA KHAN WAS MADE THE PRO-CHANCELLOR OR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nJEWESS<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;KAIKHUSRAU JAHAN</span></b>&nbsp;, BEGUM OF BHOPAL WAS THE CHANCELLOR OF AMU. .. IMAGINE A WOMAN CHANCELLOR OF A MUSLIM UNIVERSITY--ONLY ROTHSCHILD COULD HAVE PULLED THAT OFF.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN BEFORE WORLD WAR 1 STARTED ROTHSCHILD MADE HER THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE LADIES ASSOCIATION.. SHE WAS MADE DAME GRAND CROSS OF THE BRITISH EMPIRE.. BAAP REH !<br />\n<br />\nHER SON JEW&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HAMIDULLAH KHAN&nbsp;</span></b>WAS AN AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD..HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF THE CHAMBER OF PRINCES.&nbsp; &nbsp;SIR HAMIDULLAH KHAN HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF AMU FOR 5 YEARS ..&nbsp; HAMIDULLAH KHANs GRAND DAUGHER WAS MARRIED TO NAWAB OF PATAUDI (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAREENA KAPOORs FATHER-IN-LAW</span></b>&nbsp;)...<br />\n<br />\nJEW<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;SIR MUHAMMED IQBAL&nbsp;</span></b>( POET ) IS PAKISTANs NO 1 CITIZEN..<br />\n<br />\nAt Heidelberg Germany, one street ( at Marriott Hotel over looking river Neckar ) is named after Iqbal called IQBAL UFER-- thanks to German Jew Rothschild..Rothschild rewarded him for his role in pouring cold water over Muslim world anger over Palestine and ending the powerful Ottoman empire at Turkey.<br />\n<br />\nIqbal was first noticed by Rothschild , as a piece of clay to be molded, when he wrote something which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. 206.)<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life of Pi is a sea survival, Booker prize winning novel penned by a Canadian author Yann Martel and published in 2001. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6tRTB1t3HS8/ULhoecPRdTI/AAAAAAAAZD4/vujaZ5Qfaj4/s1600/300px-Marianatrenchmap.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">It has to be a &nbsp;fantasy as ocean currents cannot carry you from the Mariana Trench to the West coast of Mexico and that too in 227 days. &nbsp;The novel\nwas initially rejected by at least five London publishing houses.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_wh5ymDMNhk/ULhoV5A85AI/AAAAAAAAZDw/ro-nkQtxtJA/s1600/312z0wp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The movie under the\nsame name is a super-grand tale of endurance, faith, friendship, and indefatigable\nhuman spirit. &nbsp;This movie has the most astonishing\nand impressive \u2018 3D visual effects movie\u2019 ever made. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">--what more could you ask\nfor. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Says adult Pi, &nbsp;Irfan\nKhan, who appears to be at peace with his past &nbsp;\"You don't know the strength of your\nfaith until it's tested.\" &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And this\nforms the basis of the entire plot from the point when Pi fights for survival\non sea with a ravenous and famished tiger till the end of his adventure-filled\nvoyage. For intelligent people , this movie provides abundant food for thought.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">David Magee's script is\nsteeped in spiritualism, and Ang Lee's mastery of the computer graphics\ntechnology elevates the script to dizzying heights. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wrestling with\nspirituality onscreen can often be exhausting and unrewarding.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This type of a movie\nout of a book would have been \u201cinconceivable\u201d a decade ago due to technological\nlimitations. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;
