font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main character&nbsp; Piscine Molitor \"Pi\" Patel, &nbsp;is a 17\nyear old Indian boy from Pondicherry, who uses his wits and&nbsp; survives 7.5 months &nbsp;after his ship sank in the\nPacific, near the 11 kilometer deep Mariana Trench. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suraj Sharma, a\nnon-actor selected by director Lee from a field of 3,000 candidates, plays Pi\nof the lifeboat sequences, which is really the heart of the movie. He has for lone\ncompany a fierce adult Bengal tiger\nnamed Richard Parker.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pi finished off\nhis 227 day ordeal in a lifeboat at sea on a note of heartwarming self-awakening.\n</span>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The story shifts back\nand forth between two perspectives-- that of present-day Pi as he narrates the\nstory to a novelist looking for a new idea, and through teenage Pi's eyes as\nit's happening first hand at sea .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nXuIL4hqG1s/ULhdBCZ9joI/AAAAAAAAZBo/y6nYjj_D7gI/s1600/imagesJJNNBBG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"142\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nXuIL4hqG1s/ULhdBCZ9joI/AAAAAAAAZBo/y6nYjj_D7gI/s400/imagesJJNNBBG.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life of Pi is divided\ninto three story telling sections. &nbsp;In\nthe first section, Pi as an adult ( Irfan Khan ) reminisces about his childhood,\nto a &nbsp;character called Writer (Rafe\nSpall) in the kitchen of his Montreal home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Writer has made the\npilgrimage because in his travels in India, he met Pi's godfather who convinced\nhim that that Pi had a story so astonishing it could make him believe in God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian boy of\nPiscine Militor Patel , takes the initiative to change &nbsp;his name to \"Pi\" when he begins\nsecondary school, because he is sick and tired of being taunted with the\nnickname \"Pissing Patel\". &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Young\nPi declares himself a Catholic, a Hindu, a Muslim. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He starts to follow all three religions as he\n\"just wants to love God. &nbsp;He doesn't\ntruly understand the meaning of faith &nbsp;until he's alone at sea , battling all odds and\npleading for a sign from God.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His love of God, of\nbeasts and a first love back home in the dancing class at Pondicherry endear.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole story from\nthe beginning has an undercurrent of faith versus. reason. Pi's father is a\npractical atheist while his mother is a traditionalist who holds onto her Hindu\nreligion as something that connects her to her past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His rationalist father who owns a zoo in Pondicherry, had provided Pi some elementary understanding of Bengal\ntiger &nbsp;psychology early in life.. One day when Pi as a child attempted to feed the fierce tiger in the zoo while sitting outside the bars, his father\ngets upset, &nbsp;at his faith in God .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His father ties up a lamb at the same place ,\nwhere Pi was sitting with a piece of meat outside the bars. &nbsp;. \u201cWhy not start with reason?\u201d he taunts his\nson. &nbsp;The tiger named Richard Parker, a name given only due to clerical error, suddenly\nwith an infra sound blood chilling roar, &nbsp;pounces on the tethered lamb and pulls the\ncarcass with its paws through the bars and carries it away for a meal.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His father\n(Adil Hussain) forces him to watch this scene. His father concludes this\ngruesome demonstration with some terse advise &nbsp;\u201cA tiger is not your friend.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pi is open-minded about\nhis spirituality, despite the pleas of his rationalist father to settle for one\nset of beliefs. &nbsp;By believing in\neverything, perhaps the boy believes in nothing, his father rightly cautions\nhis mother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SGTCUj8PsLE/ULhdiTWxAGI/AAAAAAAAZBw/D2vt0DcOlaw/s1600/MV5BNTg2OTY2ODg5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODM5MTYxOA@@._V1._SY317_.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SGTCUj8PsLE/ULhdiTWxAGI/AAAAAAAAZBw/D2vt0DcOlaw/s640/MV5BNTg2OTY2ODg5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODM5MTYxOA@@._V1._SY317_.jpg\" width=\"432\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having fallen into hard\ntimes, one fine day his father decides to shut down the zoo and move to Canada.\nSo in the &nbsp;second part of the novel, Pi leaves\nPondicherry where he spent his childhood and had his first love . He embarks a\nsmall Japanese ship to Canada with his family carrying some of the exotic animals\nfrom their zoo. Their sea voyage soon takes a tragic turn.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the middle of the\nnight, woken up by the ship\u2019s movements in rough seas , Pi goes out of his cabin and foolishly\nopens a water tight door ( which is the real reason why the ship sank ) . He goes on\nthe upper bridge deck and starts a&nbsp; foolhardy\ndance, &nbsp;in a building typhoon , sliding\naround here and there with every roll of the ship.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A huge wave causes water to enter the accommodation\nvia the open water tight door. &nbsp;The Japanese\nship Tsimtsum takes a list and capsizes. His parents, the ship\u2019s crew, and the\nrest of the animals meet a watery grave in the dark and deep Mariana trench.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taiwanese director Ang\nLee does an amazing job of creating this typhoon. &nbsp;I have been at sea for 40 years , trust me on\nthis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the storm, Pi\nregains consciousness in a small 26 foot lifeboat with a small menagerie \u2013 a vicious\nspotted hyena, a zebra with a broken leg, an orangutan and of course the Bengal\ntiger Richard Parker.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The starving hyena\ntears into the disabled Zebra and gorges into its flesh. When the sea sick Orangutan\nkicks up a loud row in protest the vicious hyena now targets her next and kills\nher too. Natural instinct I must say.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Probably this is why the movie got PG\nrating because Director Ang Lee chose to avoid bloodletting. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suddenly the tiger who\nwas hiding under the bow awnings leaps on the hyena with a blood curdling roar and\nkills it .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Totally frightened, &nbsp;Pi\nconstructs a small raft out of lifejackets , oars and lifeboat bilge wooden\ngratings , tethers it to the boat using the painter , and retreats on to it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Man and beast must work\nout a uneasy truce\u2014first out of need, then out of unstated respect. The tiger's\nweapons are his teeth and claws, against which &nbsp;man has to pit his brain . The tiger needs Pi to keep him alive and NOT vice versa.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstances\neventually force Pi to forge an uneasy co-existence with the tiger. He provides\nfood and water to the tiger using his mental faculty.&nbsp; The sensitive relationship between man and beast evolves\nin front of your eyes\u2014fraught with danger and fear of the unknown.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MxREvO86kDo/ULhe_xUOyuI/AAAAAAAAZB4/KSiRZPhV3Kw/s1600/imagesJKL;'.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"406\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MxREvO86kDo/ULhe_xUOyuI/AAAAAAAAZB4/KSiRZPhV3Kw/s640/imagesJKL;'.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Maybe Richard\nParker can't be tamed,\" Pi tells himself in a soliloquy, \"but with\nGod's will he can be trained.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>He now sets about\nproving that he is the master to the tiger. He rocks the boat till the tiger\nfeels terribly seasick and starts puking all over the place. While the tiger is\nin acute discomfort Pi blows on the life jacket whistle.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OFAlNfcfU9w/ULjxgOIHkpI/AAAAAAAAZG0/E6RpI7YyEeI/s1600/fuuu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OFAlNfcfU9w/ULjxgOIHkpI/AAAAAAAAZG0/E6RpI7YyEeI/s1600/fuuu.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The whistle is now a\nsignal \u2013 &nbsp;rather an evil omen to the tiger, shape up buddy, or you are due for some\nreal bad treatment. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The majority of the\nfilm is one long sequence in which Pi and the tiger get to know each other and\nco-exist on the boat.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W-SX0_-x5rM/ULhqItNUt4I/AAAAAAAAZEg/hLxN1Yvh1Cw/s1600/imagesttt55.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W-SX0_-x5rM/ULhqItNUt4I/AAAAAAAAZEg/hLxN1Yvh1Cw/s640/imagesttt55.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eventually, our Richard Parker learns to forge a wary\nco-existance with Pi's presence and they both live in the boat for several\nmonths.</span> &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I must digress here. This\nyear\u2019s best performance honors must go to an animal -- a TIGER named &nbsp;Richard Parker .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His expressive eyes bores into your soul. &nbsp;You could almost tell exactly what this grand creature was thinking or trying to express . Once\nhe tried to catch a big fish and jumped into the sea. He could NOT climb back onto the boat due to exhaustion.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-r1u9TE5vqAs/ULhqCofMIPI/AAAAAAAAZEY/NsXGFR-osv0/s1600/imagesvgttt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"427\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-r1u9TE5vqAs/ULhqCofMIPI/AAAAAAAAZEY/NsXGFR-osv0/s640/imagesvgttt.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While about to drown with only his eyes and\nnose above water with NIL aggro, his imploring eyes , eyeballing Pi\u2019s eyes, spoke\nvolumes . Till then Richard Parker had only looked at Pi as emergency lifeboat food\nrations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The computer graphics imaging ( CGI ) work here is absolutely amazing.\n&nbsp;I am an artist myself and I do\nunderstand this poignant scene. The whole cinema hall audience went slack jawed\nafter this emotional scene , where Pi keeps the tiger alive, till the end of the movie, giving it food and water using his initiative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real star of the show\nis the tiger who is forced by circumstances to be in a symbiotic relationship\nwith a human. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Their face-off, and the ambivalence Pi feels\ntoward the beast \u2014 both drawn to him and fearing him.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Created from a mix of CGI\nand four actual Bengal Tigers, the animal character is an alternating mix of\nhouse pet lovability and blood chilling beastly impulse.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8kWO8Eya98U/ULhoC0RagUI/AAAAAAAAZDo/5ZH07rrZKYY/s1600/imagesOOIJHTR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"369\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8kWO8Eya98U/ULhoC0RagUI/AAAAAAAAZDo/5ZH07rrZKYY/s640/imagesOOIJHTR.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The switches between\nreal and CGI tigers are imperceptible most of the time. Once the tiger leaps\nout of the 3D screen on to your face, making some in the audience sh#t in their\npants , or petticoats , as the case may be.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we saw the movie, there was a half wit who cried</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b> AIYYYYOOOOO</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> so loudly\nout of fear and his family had to take him out of the hall. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Technical awards are in\norder for all those who helped create the most memorable movie character of the\nyear. &nbsp;I am a cat lover and I do know big\ncat behavior . &nbsp;The tiger, fur ripples in\nthe wind so realistically that you\u2019d try to reach out and stroke it if you\nweren\u2019t so alert to the animal\u2019s fierceness.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uN9end8HUWU/ULmOqMuD25I/AAAAAAAAZHw/BV-lvc8W2tM/s1600/Life-of-Pi-Shipwreck.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"336\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uN9end8HUWU/ULmOqMuD25I/AAAAAAAAZHw/BV-lvc8W2tM/s640/Life-of-Pi-Shipwreck.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The created graphically\nthe ever changing ocean that\u2019s alive with shifting hues and mesmerizing \u2014\nsometimes swift and startling \u2014 sea life swimming past. &nbsp;They created spectacular typhoons followed by\nturquoise serenity. The night time ocean aglow with luminescent sea-life may\nseem artificial to land lubbers , but having crossed the Pacific dozens of\ntimes I can tell you I have seen even better ones.\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even after this scene there\nis never is a point where Pi can be sure he has made a friend of the predatory tiger,\nconsidering the lesson his father had given him in the zoo. &nbsp;For 227 days, as he struggles to survive on\ncanned water and tinned biscuits. One fine day finding no more biscuits , he had to break his vegetarian\nhabits and start eating raw fish, to survive, at odds with his faith.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pi recounts a chain of\nevents &nbsp;while adrift at sea , including\ndiscovering an island of carnivorous algae inhabited by thousands of &nbsp;meerkats.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YbcNqB6w314/ULmOCuyJOuI/AAAAAAAAZHg/jDhNfIS6h8Q/s1600/imageshhkoo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YbcNqB6w314/ULmOCuyJOuI/AAAAAAAAZHg/jDhNfIS6h8Q/s640/imageshhkoo.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The island was shaped like Lord Vishnu in recline.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pi and Richard Parker eat\nto their hearts content, </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">but soon\ndiscover that the island is home to a carnivorous algae that, at night turns\nthe ground to a Methanetetraol acid trap.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OakJlk0m1yM/ULmOK9AT88I/AAAAAAAAZHo/DC8vRXnwWtc/s1600/ggghyu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"352\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OakJlk0m1yM/ULmOK9AT88I/AAAAAAAAZHo/DC8vRXnwWtc/s640/ggghyu.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pi realizes that eventually the island\nwill consume them \u2013 so he stocks the lifeboat with edible roots , greens and\nmeerkats and the pair sets sail again. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He realised only because the tiger would NOT sleep on the island at night, and preferred the boat. &nbsp;This is one time beast saves man.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UoxT03WebTM/ULhjpG8ashI/AAAAAAAAZCk/X64OYsymeoc/s1600/ffrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"252\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UoxT03WebTM/ULhjpG8ashI/AAAAAAAAZCk/X64OYsymeoc/s320/ffrr.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 227 days, the\nlifeboat washes up onto the coast of Mexico and Richard Parker immediately\nescapes into the nearby jungle WITHOUT CASTING A BACKWARD GLANCE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The significance of 227 days is from the common\napproximation of \u03c0 using the fraction 22/7.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the third part of\nthe novel, two Jap superintendents from the Japanese Ministry of Transport\nspeak to Pi at his Mexican hospital bed to ascertain why the ship sank. &nbsp;Insurance matters have to be settled. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When they do not believe his apparent cock\nand bull fantasy tiger story, &nbsp;he tells\nan alternate story of human brutality, in which Pi was adrift on a lifeboat\nwith his mother, a sailor with a broken leg, and the ship's cook, who killed\nthe sailor and Pi's mother and cut them up to use as bait and food.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k5m89xuelBw/ULhp0XkmqMI/AAAAAAAAZEI/Iw_XBBIFi1Q/s1600/images7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k5m89xuelBw/ULhp0XkmqMI/AAAAAAAAZEI/Iw_XBBIFi1Q/s400/images7.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parallels\nto Pi's first story lead the Japanese officials to believe that the orangutan\nrepresents his mother, the zebra represents the sailor, the hyena represents\nthe cook, and Richard Parker is Pi himself.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pi does NOT tell them that he opened up a watertight door in a typhoon , which is forbidden unless the Captain is informed, &nbsp;by the watch keeper on the navigating bridge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After giving all the\nrelevant information, Pi asks the insurance adjusters , which of the two stories they prefer. Since the\nofficials cannot prove which story is true, &nbsp;and neither is relevant to the\nreasons behind the shipwreck, based on which they have to retrieve insurance moolah, they choose the story with the tiger. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are no answers .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pi thanks them and says, \"and so it goes\nwith God\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3vH3cKKxWsE/ULhpvz8HDHI/AAAAAAAAZEA/hGGgeBR1Qd8/s1600/imagesgyuii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3vH3cKKxWsE/ULhpvz8HDHI/AAAAAAAAZEA/hGGgeBR1Qd8/s1600/imagesgyuii.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT THE FACT THAT <span style=\"color: blue;\">YOUNG\nPI KEPT STRESSING THAT RICHARD PARKER WENT AWAY INTO THE MEXICAN FOREST <b>WITHOUT\nCASTING A GLANCE BACKWARDS</b> </span>IN GRATITUDE , TO ACKNOWLEDGE THEIR 227 DAY STAY\nTOGETHER AND FOR FAVORS RECEIVED-- &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>---MAKES A\nPSYCHOLOGIST WONDER IF THE SECOND STORY OF <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CANNIBALISM </span>WAS INDEED THE TRUE ONE.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The audience must\ndecide which story to believe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With such deep philosophical issues, Pi is most\nprofound when he asks, \u201cWhat does it all mean?\u201d then answers, \u201cIt doesn\u2019t have\nto mean anything.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oCTP13TaVac/ULhkWk5gg8I/AAAAAAAAZCs/uxCP4chGQHM/s1600/Life_of_pi3.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oCTP13TaVac/ULhkWk5gg8I/AAAAAAAAZCs/uxCP4chGQHM/s400/Life_of_pi3.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Was the obvious cannibalism suppressed\nby the Jap investigators as it would open the quintessential Pandora\u2019s box? The\ntiger story would be less messy and more reader worthy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">IN ANY CASE WHEN INSURANCE ADJUSTERS COME IN , <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">TRUTH IS ALWAYS THE FIRST&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 24px;\">CASUALTY</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;</span>AT SEA.</span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">You don\u2019t just watch\nthis compelling &nbsp;movie, you live it. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a richly drawn\ninterior work, much of it spent inside Pi's mind or awash in his memories.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rarely\nwill you come across such a unique human journey filled with self-discovery,\nself-doubt, &nbsp;denial and affirmation of\nfaith. Such a grand accomplishment in storytelling on 3D screen \u2013 it is both\nvisual and emotional. Technology almost falls out of the equation.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rkt2pbWOJvI/ULhn6rHTLfI/AAAAAAAAZDg/nsUO_wKoCkg/s1600/imagesP%5BIKHH.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rkt2pbWOJvI/ULhn6rHTLfI/AAAAAAAAZDg/nsUO_wKoCkg/s640/imagesP%5BIKHH.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The team of CGI, created\na really credible flesh-and-blood wild beast, convincingly ferocious and\nundeniably scary, yet vulnerable and poignant too. &nbsp;The audience is slack jawed most of the time\nas they are trapped in and over awed by the unfolding spectacle. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mountainous waves reach\nout to engulf us while, &nbsp;underwater, boiling currents writhe and seethe. The\nphosphorescent sea glows under moonbeams, as whales breach and sharks circle\nand an entire air force of luminous silver fish flies, &nbsp;some bang into Pi chest\nleaving behind scales and red welts. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blooms\nof bio luminescent algae , the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ethereal underwater\nworld illuminated by phosphorescence,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">star-drenched midnight skies</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;lavishes astonishing visual beauty .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fDEVf9h60y4/ULhnwYBkkQI/AAAAAAAAZDY/TmtWVr24H4s/s1600/imageshhjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fDEVf9h60y4/ULhnwYBkkQI/AAAAAAAAZDY/TmtWVr24H4s/s400/imageshhjk.jpg\" width=\"288\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">Many people say that\nthe end was a disappointment. &nbsp;I would\nagree with them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Ang Lee should re-edit this movie by putting some nostalgia at the end \u2013 like\nhow the Titanic movie ended with the rotten barnacle encrusted ballroom staircase coming into\nlife--</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">-- with the dead lovers once again in flesh and blood on the staircase looking\nat each other.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jd5aH0ROOsw/ULhp6tv3R_I/AAAAAAAAZEQ/-tgXTTKsliI/s1600/imagesGJKL;''.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jd5aH0ROOsw/ULhp6tv3R_I/AAAAAAAAZEQ/-tgXTTKsliI/s640/imagesGJKL;''.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me give you a\nreview of this exquisite &nbsp;movie which can\nbe seen by a small child to an old man, &nbsp;made\nby India\u2019s major film critic Rajeev Masand\u2014 yeah the one who speaks like a\nchakka while sitting on a stool . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He wields\nso much of power that even Aishwarya Rai does cootchie coo to him , sometimes\npoking his ribs, so that he gives a better future review.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out his intellect and\nhis grasp of the narrative. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mOnDkMACVkQ/ULhxNJxRyvI/AAAAAAAAZFc/Es0RHJ4bW84/s1600/downloadghhj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mOnDkMACVkQ/ULhxNJxRyvI/AAAAAAAAZFc/Es0RHJ4bW84/s1600/downloadghhj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Ratings:3.5/5\nReviewer: Rajeev Masand Site: CNN IBN (IBN Live)<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>'Life of Pi, directed\nby Ang Lee, is a film so fascinating and so stunning to look at, you don\u2019t want\nto blink for fear of missing out on a moment. It\u2019s the only film since James\nCameron\u2019s Avatar to exploit 3D so richly. Yet, Life of Pi is not an easy film,\nalthough it does deliver many pleasures. The payoff in the end feels slight and\nnot entirely convincing, but what you can never deny is that this film is\nunlike any other you\u2019ve ever seen. &nbsp;</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I\u2019m going with three-and-a-half out of five\nfor Ang Lee\u2019s Life of Pi. It may not touch your heart, but it\u2019s a feast for the\neyes. Watch it for its sheer visual brilliance.&nbsp;</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">SQUEAK &nbsp; SQUEAK!!</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KOGqVrihSYw/ULhsXJLo7hI/AAAAAAAAZEo/5DIIB_ifBC4/s1600/imagesvvggg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KOGqVrihSYw/ULhsXJLo7hI/AAAAAAAAZEo/5DIIB_ifBC4/s640/imagesvvggg.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a movie , with spiritual underpinnings that dwells\nupon questions of human existence and man\u2019s tangled relationship with God, flora,\nfauna and nature, with ridiculous ease.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life\nof Pi gives you a glance into the depth of this universe, while not allowing\nsuch visuals &nbsp;to overshadow the substance\nof the narrative. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Find breathtaking\nenchantment in what is essentially a simple allegory about life, religion and\nsurvival in hostile circumstances.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a movie with a soul.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IUC9c4eNNb0/ULjOxZe_qqI/AAAAAAAAZGI/_y39RlFItYE/s1600/life-of-pi-on-boat-very-pretty-722x500.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"443\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IUC9c4eNNb0/ULjOxZe_qqI/AAAAAAAAZGI/_y39RlFItYE/s640/life-of-pi-on-boat-very-pretty-722x500.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Grab a piece of this Pi\naction, made by a director at the top of his game. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><i>Along comes Ang Lee</i> -- </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">YIKES!</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>It is a must watch-- so says Capt Ajit Vadakayil. <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Jealous and paid up DORKS keep away\u2014 complex\nthemes of spirituality and self-discovery, in the guise of an accessible and\nengrossing fantasy , is not for you.&nbsp;</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EPILOGUE: &nbsp;Our company had a modern Chemical tanker which was adrift sea without power for weeks. &nbsp;In a hurricane, one crew member opened a watertight\ndoor like our man Pi. &nbsp;&nbsp;A giant wave caused sea water to pour into the\naccommodation , and salt ingressed the emergency generator room. &nbsp;The bus bar of the main generator was\nconnected to ESB in this room by a clandestine connection and the ship lost the\nmain switch board, with total loss of power and blackout. &nbsp;&nbsp;Finally\nshe had to be towed into port, and when the main power finally came back on after\nrepairs , 42 days had passed. &nbsp;When a\nship loses power it starts rolling heavily due to beam swell. &nbsp;&nbsp;Cargo in the holds of cargo ships shifts and\nthe ship lists over and sinks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Grace and peace!</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/6XP-f7wPM0A/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/6XP-f7wPM0A&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/6XP-f7wPM0A&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
