Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "21", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1743643876643228865/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "1519072126490840777", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-11-28T13:39:00+05:30", "updated": "2012-11-28T13:39:27+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzU0MDkwMTY3NDY2Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/pressure-vessel-permit-to-work-on.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1519072126490840777", "title": "PRESSURE VESSEL PERMIT TO WORK ON CHEMICAL TANKERS-  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9AA813OpTBc/ULXDNZpAHzI/AAAAAAAAY-4/pZAw1q4dH-w/s1600/hhhj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"260\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9AA813OpTBc/ULXDNZpAHzI/AAAAAAAAY-4/pZAw1q4dH-w/s400/hhhj.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>PRESSURE VESSEL PERMIT TO WORK ON CHEMICAL TANKERS</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9MKY4fCuGyo/ULXGqeVMSFI/AAAAAAAAZAA/dUG9dcYhPfM/s1600/downloadR444.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9MKY4fCuGyo/ULXGqeVMSFI/AAAAAAAAZAA/dUG9dcYhPfM/s1600/downloadR444.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRESSURE MUST ALWAYS BE\nEXPECTED INSIDE A CHEMICAL TANKERS CARGO PIPELINES&nbsp; CONTAINING TOXIC, CARCINOGENIC,\nBIOACCUMULATIVE, CORROSIVE OR HEATED CHEMICALS --&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- WHICH CAN SCALD, KILL , MAIM\nINSTANTLY OR AFFECT YOUR FUTURE GENERATIONS WITH GROSS MORPHOLOGICAL ABNORMALITIES\nSUCH AS CLEFT LIP. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8_5cleyudJU/ULXDu2ExVEI/AAAAAAAAY_I/0WTmARH1xNw/s1600/RTT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"274\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8_5cleyudJU/ULXDu2ExVEI/AAAAAAAAY_I/0WTmARH1xNw/s320/RTT.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is usual on parcel\nchemical tankers to introduce air or nitrogen at 7 kg pressure into pipelines\nto blow the stack or clear the line. Imagine a slug of free flowing dangerous\ncargo like Sulphuric acid being projected through a pipe by compressed air of 7\nkg which you deliberately introduce into the pipelines at stripping time. It\nwill smash into all corners like a bullet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MGkpK9M-Vo4/ULXEIwfIR6I/AAAAAAAAY_Q/3RJ9pehAnck/s1600/imagesGT6Y7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MGkpK9M-Vo4/ULXEIwfIR6I/AAAAAAAAY_Q/3RJ9pehAnck/s400/imagesGT6Y7.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vapour lock means boiling in cargo\nlines due to excessive VP . Do not open any pipeline without depressurizing it\nfirst on a chemical tanker. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crew must be aware of\nthe direction of wind by looking at the anemometer fan on the mast when\nreleasing the pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All must be familiar with eye wash and shower\narrangements. Goggles&nbsp; of the appropriate\ntype and as required are to be worn on top of hardhats by deck crew to be used\nwhen required at an instant notice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When loading\nCarcinogenic, Toxic or Bioaccumulative cargoes, ascertain the TLV-TWA .\nThe&nbsp; Vervey\u2019s&nbsp; tankcleaning&nbsp;\nguide&nbsp; gives&nbsp; the&nbsp;\nVP/TLV&nbsp; ratio---&nbsp; anything&nbsp;\nmore&nbsp; than&nbsp; one&nbsp; is&nbsp; dangerous requiring the use of Draeger tubes\non deck and great care while opening out blanks and spools at manifold.&nbsp; Epichlorohydrin is 17, Methanol is 0.46\n(200/92). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Filter protection must\nonly be used against gases which has a distinctive smell and there is no lack\nof oxygen. If you can smell gas it means the filter is saturated and is to be\ndiscarded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Class 1/ 1000ppm<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Class2/ 5000 ppm<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mark X/ low BP products<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ekp4qmDAh3o/ULXF8S_eZTI/AAAAAAAAY_4/1l0jjh_AgRk/s1600/imagesHHY6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ekp4qmDAh3o/ULXF8S_eZTI/AAAAAAAAY_4/1l0jjh_AgRk/s320/imagesHHY6.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those not actually\ninvolved in a job should still be aware of what is happening, so that they may\navoid putting themselves at risk or interfere with an unsafe act before it is\ntoo late. All&nbsp; should care for their own\nhealth and safety and for their shipmates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas suits have\nresistance tables Viton/ Chloroprene rubber/ PVC. Positive pressure inside the\nsuits&nbsp; add to safety.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Splash suits \u2013for\nprotection against liquid splashes \u2013polyamide fabric coated both sides with\nPVC. Hood with draw string to fit under the helmet. Front&nbsp; zipper must be protected by double fly</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">front.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">A PVP Permit must be\nissued for all maintenance and repairs to pressure vessels, bolted plates,\nmanhole covers and pipelines used for&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">pressurized</span></span><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;or hot liquids, gases and\nvapours, e.g. cargo/fuel oil, hydraulic systems, water, compressed air, steam\nlines, etc. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A PVP Permit must also\nbe issued where work on a pressure vessel or pipeline system may result in a\npotential risk from the above to cause:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Injuries to\npersonnel,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Release of a\npollutant to air or the sea or on deck,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Uncontrolled sea water\ningress in the machinery or other&nbsp;\nspaces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r2KmkG02EaI/ULXEXTtqAaI/AAAAAAAAY_Y/iAggqb5zm9c/s1600/downloadFGYT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"213\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r2KmkG02EaI/ULXEXTtqAaI/AAAAAAAAY_Y/iAggqb5zm9c/s320/downloadFGYT.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PVP Permits must be\nissued in conjunction with \" DO NOT OPERATE\" tags. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prior to commencing\nwork all valves or cocks used to vent or drain the pressure vessel or pipeline\nsystem must be OPEN and secured; all valves or cocks used to isolate the\npressure vessel or pipeline system must be CLOSED and secured. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All such valves, cocks\nand the associated machinery/equipment must be tagged with \"Do Not\nOperate\" tags. Details of the tagged valves should be listed on the Permit\nor a Tag Out/Lock Out Record.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"Do Not\nOperate\" tags must contain the following information:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- The name and/or rank\nof the person placing the tag. This person is the only person who can remove or\nauthorise the removal of such tags, unless a senior officer, authorises the\nremoval. In such an event this Senior Officer must ensure that all work has\nbeen completed and/or that it is safe to return the system to use.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- The date and time\nthat the tag was placed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- The PVP Permit\nidentity number relating to the tag out. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where a PVP Work Permit\nis issued for pipelines which are connected to equipment that is mechanically\noperated, but electrically driven, it must be ensured that the driving\nequipment is electrically isolated. The circuit breakers or switches must be\nlocked out, and \"Do Not Operate\" tags applied, and an&nbsp; Electrical Work Permit (EWP) issued. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These \"Do Not\nOperate\" tags should state the PVP identity number, name and/or rank of\nthe officer posting the tag, date and time of posting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"Do Not\nOperate\" tags must be completed using a non erasable ink, i.e. felt or\nfibre tip marker. They are of the \"use once only\" type.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A PVP Work Permit must\nbe issued for each individual job.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NbBzcqo1HdY/ULXFTHmU76I/AAAAAAAAY_o/1Xr23LzPOyY/s1600/imagesFGGH6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NbBzcqo1HdY/ULXFTHmU76I/AAAAAAAAY_o/1Xr23LzPOyY/s1600/imagesFGGH6.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where more than one job\nis carried out on the same pressure vessel or pipeline system, a Permit is\nrequired for each job. However only one tag need be used, provided that all\nPermit identity numbers applicable to that pressure vessel or pipeline system,\nare recorded on the tag and the same person is carrying out all the work.\nShould different persons be carrying out work on the same pressure vessel or\npipeline system then a tag is to be placed by each person<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: The validity of\nthis Permit is usually only for the working day. If extended or continuous work\n(24 hour) is to be carried out, the Permit should be cancelled and re-issued at\nthe time of a change of shifts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A PVP Work Permit must\nbe authorised by a senior officer,&nbsp; in\nrespect of all relevant work carried out in the machinery spaces, accommodation\nspaces, store spaces or on deck by any personnel, including outside\ncontractors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the\nresponsibility of the Permit Authoriser to ensure that the pressure vessel or\npipeline system to which the Permit refers, is correctly isolated and drained\nor vented. The Permit Authoriser must ensure that all \"Do Not\nOperate\" tags are in position before work commences, and should be in\nattendance as work commences to ensure that the correct pressure vessel or\npipeline system is being worked on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Permit Authoriser\nmust regularly monitor the work progress to ensure that all isolation/safety\nrequirements contained in the Permit are being adhered to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_33BmiRdwsA/ULXElazo83I/AAAAAAAAY_g/tcrRHJEdPsI/s1600/imagesBBNM.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_33BmiRdwsA/ULXElazo83I/AAAAAAAAY_g/tcrRHJEdPsI/s320/imagesBBNM.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A PVP Work Permit need\nnot be issued for work undertaken during major repair periods with the\nmachinery plant shut down. However, it is the responsibility of the Chief\nEngineer or Permit Authoriser, to ensure that all pressure vessels and pipeline\nsystems that are to be worked on, have been completely drained/vented, cooled\ndown and are safe to work on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although a pressure\nvessel or pipeline system may appear to be isolated and drained/vented, it is\npossible for valves to leak and vents or drains to be blocked. Personnel\nworking on the pressure vessel or pipeline system, and the Permit Authoriser,\nmust be aware of this and ensure that great caution is exercised when removing\npipes, valves, covers, etc. as follows:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yHudx9TN3_Y/ULXFqzlCfPI/AAAAAAAAY_w/lBwx7ZwUVFI/s1600/imagesGHYYY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yHudx9TN3_Y/ULXFqzlCfPI/AAAAAAAAY_w/lBwx7ZwUVFI/s1600/imagesGHYYY.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Never remove all the\nsecuring bolts at once before loosening a flange or cover.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Always ease back the\nbolts and ensure that the flange or cover is free and there is no pressure\nbehind it before removing the bolts or fixing clamp.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Personnel must be\naware of the potential danger from accumulated hot liquids or hot vapours\nbeing released from opened pipes or pressure vessels due to leaking valves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jrS_F5vUvVs/ULXDUKB46xI/AAAAAAAAY_A/dHSbEU_VJss/s1600/images+(4).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"282\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jrS_F5vUvVs/ULXDUKB46xI/AAAAAAAAY_A/dHSbEU_VJss/s320/images+(4).jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "11", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1519072126490840777/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3386819714999897075", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-11-24T11:50:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-09-10T14:28:12+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTM2NTY5ODkyMzk0Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3386819714999897075", "title": "RIP IMPOSSIBLE WITH BURIAL, THE WORLD IS GOING BACK TO CREMATION-  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">HINDU WAY OF OPEN AIR CREMATION OF DEAD BODY</span> , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">SKULL POPPING SOLITON WAVE</span> , &nbsp; <span style=\"color: magenta;\">SOUL PROPULSION ON CARRIER WAVE TO COMPATIBLE AKASHA PLANE</span> , &nbsp;DESTRUCTION OF CADAVER TO QUANTUM ELEMENTS</b></span>&nbsp;, <span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>CREMATION VERSUS BURIAL</b></span> - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TsNCRWIFpgI/ULExuTHwj5I/AAAAAAAAY8o/sNMmyCgk04Y/s1600/imageshjjj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TsNCRWIFpgI/ULExuTHwj5I/AAAAAAAAY8o/sNMmyCgk04Y/s1600/imageshjjj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; If you cant beat them join them, right?. But still\nthey made crematoriums which look like churches.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protestant churches\nwere much more welcoming of the use of cremation and at a much earlier date\nthan the Catholic Church, as they too could NOT stem the anti-burial and pro-cremation\nstrong tide.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Eastern Orthodox\nand Oriental Orthodox Churches strictly forbid cremation . In Orthodoxy,\ncremation is a rejection of the dogma of the general resurrection, and as such\nis viewed harshly, still people stonewalled and opted for cremation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In ancient times\nthroughout parts of Europe, cremation was forbidden by law, and even punishable\nby death . In Goa, India,&nbsp; during the\nPortuguese inquisition, cremation was banned and most of the Hindus left their\nlands and migrated.&nbsp; The poor having no\nchoice , were given these deserted lands and houses and converted into\nChristianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An extreme form of\ncremation , when alive was used by Vatican authorities as part of punishment\nfor heretics\u2014this being burning at the stake.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">It is my prediction that in another 20 years almost ALL Christians would prefer to be cremated. &nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu cremations are\ndone on wood and in open air. &nbsp;When you cremate\na dead body the high-temperatures of the fire ( &nbsp;&gt;1000 deg C &nbsp;) cause&nbsp;\nburning, vaporization, and oxidation to reduce it to basic chemical\ncompounds, such as gases and mineral fragments retaining the appearance of dry\nbone. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An adult human body of\n90 kilos will just leave behind 2 kilos of bone reside, mostly dry calcium phosphates\nwith some minor minerals, such as salts of sodium and potassium, with a very\nsmall amount of carbon as carbonate..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not burying the body has\nnothing to do with groundwater pollution. It is about shooting the soul, &nbsp;riding a soliton carrier wave , to an akashic\nor ethereal plane, via a quantum wormhole- when the skull pops during cremation.\n&nbsp;A soliton is the quantum chaos sine wave\nthat achieves anti gravity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since past 11000 years\nHindu vedic rituals require breaking of the coconut at Yagnas with intention. &nbsp;It is form of bloodless sacrifice. &nbsp;The liquid spilt is electrolytic plasma. In\nquantum physics terms -- it causes a \" butterfly effect \". &nbsp;This is about sending your intention as an instantaneous\nmessage, faster than light.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human perception occurs\nbecause of interactions between the subatomic particles of our brains and the\nquantum energy sea. We literally resonate the Cosmos. The quantum field or pure\nconsciousness is influenced by intention. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zero Point Field is an information field as it\nencodes everything that has left its traces in the form of Scalar waves in this\nuniverse. This boils down to the recording of every little thought that was\never thought and every little move that was ever made. The interference\npatterns of the scalar waves form a huge hologram that permeates the whole of\nthe universe. Intention is like the tuning fork which causes other forks to\nresonate to the same frequency.&nbsp;</span></i><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-haUXeJMhHkk/ULEuSbJW0JI/AAAAAAAAY74/81O2NILqnRc/s1600/imagesCA4ZAR4I.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-haUXeJMhHkk/ULEuSbJW0JI/AAAAAAAAY74/81O2NILqnRc/s1600/imagesCA4ZAR4I.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Mind and matter are both made of the same basic\nstuff. The difference has to be found in the composition of vibration or ripples.\nMatter belongs to larger and slower waves, which implies that it possesses less\nenergy of the absolute. Mind is made out of much finer ripples, which indicate\nthat it contains more of the consciousness of the absolute. Scalar waves allow\nfor information transfer across the universe, connecting every atom with every\nother atom and since these waves travel at super luminous speeds they could be\nthe explanation of the non-local effects that were predicted in theory and\nempirically discovered in quantum physics.</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>The popping of the\nskull during cremation has a similar the same quantum effect. &nbsp;In this case it shoots the soul into a distant\nastral akashik plane within a carrier soliton wave via a wormhole.&nbsp; &nbsp;A\nsoliton is the quantum chaos sine wave that achieves anti gravity. &nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The strange properties\nof a soliton is used in fibre optics, for long distance transmission without\nuse of repeaters or boosters. Dark soliton is used in a optical fibre, unlike\nwater solitons like a tsunami.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All living humans have\na body made up of vibrational energy which is a duplicate of the physical body\nand will survive physical death. This vibrational energy body invisible to\nphysical eyes can change form but can never be destroyed and retains\nconsciousness.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">At the time of physical\ndeath, the duplicate body will have reached a certain vibrational level and\nwill go to an energy sphere that can accommodate that particular vibrations.\nThe after life has different levels of energy which form different spheres\naccording to the frequency of vibration. The faster the vibrations of a sphere\nthe more spiritually evolved are the denizens. </span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot observe the\nquantum world using our limited five senses. Instead we must imagine particles\nas they really are: structures of matter waves (like quantum waves) in their\nwave medium, the quantum ether.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus do not believe\nin bodily resurrection and the reuniting of each soul with its physical body,\nso they place no importance on preserving the corpse, which is the intent of\nburial in Christianity and Islam.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu belief in reincarnation gives\nassurance that death is merely the soul's release from the current life. An\nancient text puts it simply, \"Even as the snake sloughs off its skin, even\nas the bird leaves its shell, even as in its waking state the soul forgets\nhappenings of the dream state, thus does the soul migrate from one body to\nanother...\" (Tirumantiram 2132).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\ntrue hindu shall love death as he loves this life. &nbsp;New bodies are donned by the dweller, like\ngarments.&nbsp; &nbsp;Death is viewed in a positive light: as an\nescape from one life on the road to a better an ultimate moksha (nirvana),\nshanti (peace) and paramapada (the ultimate place). Reincarnation is viewed as\na never-ending set of cycles.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A9f9MkOK7TU/ULEtTYuJzkI/AAAAAAAAY7Q/rFlYUN7kLZA/s1600/downloadCFFRDS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A9f9MkOK7TU/ULEtTYuJzkI/AAAAAAAAY7Q/rFlYUN7kLZA/s1600/downloadCFFRDS.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One may be reincarnated millions of times. Escape\nfrom the weary cycle of reincarnation can be achieved through escape into \u201can\nunchanging anonymous Absolute\" and attaining moksha . The aim of the Hindu\nis to \"get off the wheel,\" to escape the cycle and merge finally with\nthe Oneness that was there before Creation began.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methods used on the path of\nescaping reincarnation include charity, grace , kindness, simple living, or\nliving as per the laws of the universe. Death is only another station on our\nsoul\u2019s journey to the perfect life. Once we understand what life really is,\nthen death will lose its horror.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The reality of our life continues.&nbsp; The process of dying is similar to that of\nbirth. To be born into a material life is a very natural event. The soul\nchanges spheres. To die is to be born into the spiritual worlds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus belive that the\nbody is made up of five elements which are earth, water, air, fire and ether\nand that the God of Fire transports these five elements to their respective\nmother sources at death. &nbsp;Agni (holy\nfire) is the purifying agent that enables the soul to be liberated from the\nphysical body. Usually the body is cremated within six hours, and on the very day\nthe death occurs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hcjWSt0qd14/ULEtqrTmlzI/AAAAAAAAY7o/rGVfEEE3H2w/s1600/images+(28).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hcjWSt0qd14/ULEtqrTmlzI/AAAAAAAAY7o/rGVfEEE3H2w/s1600/images+(28).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Death is only\nseparation of the astral body from the physical body .The soul leaves the body\nas soon as the person dies. Cremation in Hinduism is to induce a feeling of\ndetachment into the freshly disembodied spirit, &nbsp;lest it remain near its former body for too\nlong.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women do NOT attend the cremation as they are prone to get emotionally\nmore upset . &nbsp;The point of a funeral is\nto show respect not sadness. &nbsp;Hindus\nbelieve the dead are off to a world far better than the one they left behind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TFIqAqFUZ3g/ULEtePa_NmI/AAAAAAAAY7g/a3RHfyfCb1k/s1600/imagesDGGHNN.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The\nsoul remains in the vicinity until the ceremony is completed and the skull pops\nreleasing the solition carrier wave .</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_zkCZWkI9OI/ULEuHpNrMFI/AAAAAAAAY7w/sePld8pNfwE/s1600/images+(10).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
