font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CANNIBALISM WAS NOT A\nCRIME BY THE LAWS OF GERMANY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">You might remember the\nstory of HANSEL AND GRETEL ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abandoned in the woods\nby their parents during a time of hunger, they were taken in by an old woman\nliving in a cottage made of gingerbread and candy. They saw that the old woman\nwas bringing in wood and heating the oven, and they discovered that she was\nplanning on roasting and eating them. Gretel asked the woman to look inside the\noven to see if it was hot enough, and then pushed her in and slammed the door<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_30.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 33 % of the\nEuropean population died of brain disease ( KURU TYPE BRAIN DISEASE ) due to\nthe effects of cannibalism.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We heard of the MOUSE\nTOWER OF BINGEN -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The land of the\nprince-bishop of Bingen, a district on the Rhine river above Cologne, had\nsuffered a severe short-fall in its harvest, and food was in very short supply.\nNevertheless, the bishop demanded that everyone pay him their full rents and\ntaxes in money and in kind. He then used the money to buy up what food remained\nin the market, and stored all of it in the fortress tower in which he lived. He\ndismissed all of his dependents and servants, and then shut and locked all of\nthe gates and doors to the tower in order to be sure that people would not try\nto enter and steal the food he had hoarded there. But he need not have worried\nabout that -- the people were all gone. They had eaten every blade of grass and\nevery kernel of grain in the land. Some had died, while others had fled and\nleft the bishop as the only living person in Bingen. Just as he was\ncongratulating himself on having been clever enough to have survived the great\nhunger in comfort, he heard noises outside and at the doors. He rushed to the\ntop of the tower and saw a terrible sight. All of the starving rats and mice\nfrom the entire region had smelled the food and were hurrying toward his tower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are records of\nKing Edward II, of England and King Louis X of France being starved of food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Herman Melville\ncommonly made the concept of male homosexuality and cannibalism interchangeable<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CANNIBALISM LEADS TO\nHOMOSEXUALITY AND LEFT HANDED BABIES DUE TO CORRUPTION OF DNA PROGRAM.. THESE\nLEFT HANDED BABIES DID CANNIBALISM OF THEIR TWIN WHILE IN THE MOTHERs WOMB<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Symptoms of more common\nneurological disorders such as Parkinson\u2019s disease or stroke may resemble kuru\nsymptoms. These include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">dementia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">muscle twitching and\ntremors<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">inability to grasp\nobjects<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">random, compulsive\nlaughing or crying<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kuru belongs to a class\nof diseases called transmissible spongiform encephalopathies (TSEs), also\ncalled prion diseases. It primarily affects the cerebellum \u2014 the part of your\nbrain responsible for coordination and balance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike most infections\nor infectious agents, kuru is not caused by a bacteria, virus, or fungus.\nInfectious, abnormal proteins known as prions cause kuru. Prions are not living\norganisms and do not reproduce. They are inanimate, misshapen proteins that\nmultiply in the brain and form clumps, hindering normal brain processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ReplyDelete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Replies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit\nVadakayilJanuary 17, 2018 at 6:59 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prion caused\ndegenerative diseases --spongiform diseases like kuru, create sponge-like holes\nin your brain and are fatal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prions that cause kuru\ncan\u2019t be easily destroyed. Brains contaminated with prions remain infectious\neven when preserved in formaldehyde for years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As there is no cure for\nKURU, people infected with it may lapse into a coma within six to 12 months\nafter experiencing initial symptoms. The disease is fatal and it\u2019s best to\nprevent it by avoiding exposure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The incubation period\nof kuru \u2014 the time between initial infection and the appearance of symptoms \u2014\ncan be as long as 35 years. Cases have been reported long after the practice of\ncannibalism has ceased.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">uman prion diseases\ninclude Creutzfeldt\u2013Jakob disease (CJD) and its variant (vCJD)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN INDIA LAKHS OF\nPEOPLE HAVE DIED BECAUSE OF GROUNDWATER CONTAMINATED BY PRIONS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE MUST NEVER EVER HAVE\nBURIAL GROUNDS IN UNSUITABLE PLACES--WHICH CONTAMINATE AQUIFERS BY GROUND WATER\nSEEPAGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creutzfeldt\u2013Jakob\ndisease (CJD) is a universally fatal brain disorder..CJD is different from\nbovine spongiform encephalopathy (mad cow disease) and variant\nCreutzfeldt\u2013Jakob disease (vCJD)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prions are proteins\nthat occur normally in neurons of the central nervous system (CNS). These proteins\nare thought to affect signaling processes, damaging neurons and resulting in\ndegeneration that causes the spongiform appearance in the affected brain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; The main sign of shigella infection is ACUTE diarrhea, which often is bloody..</span><br />\nDURING RAINY SEASON FLOOD ALL WELLS , LAKES AND RIVERS GET CONTAMINATED\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KERALA IS NOT A SUITABLE PLACE FOR BURIAL OF DEAD BODIES DUE TO HEAVY RAINFALL AND LEACHING THAT FOLLOWS... GRAVEYARDS AND CEMETERIES MUST BE CHOSEN BY GROUND WATER EXPERTS ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nNO RELIGIOUS CONSIDERATION IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN HEALTH OF FUTURE HUMAN GENERATIONS..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies ( and feces in intestines ) cause bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae)..</span></div>\n<br />\nThese leachates from cemeteries contain microorganisms that pollute substrates, surface water and groundwater. The microorganisms chiefly include bacteria, viruses, intestinal fungi and protozoa\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe corpses of healthy humans and animals release bacteria, for example, those which form the group classified as total coliform bacteria: Escherichia coli, Enterobacter, Klebsiella, Citrobacter, Streptococcus faecalis, Clostridium perfringens, Clostridium welchii and Salmonella typhi, and human-hosted viruses, e.g., enterovirus . In most cases, the contamination of the environment comes from pathogenic intestinal bacteria..<br />\n<br />\nSome microorganisms are long-living and, in appropriate environmental conditions, can survive in soil profile or in groundwater for some time, some microorganisms can survive even up to 5 years and, in this time, they can migrate and reach the groundwater..<br />\n<br />\nDecomposition of interred bodies causes an increase in microbial activity in the surrounding substrate, associated with the release of persistent organic compounds..<br />\n<br />\nThese compounds can cause highly dangerous infectious disease such as liver inflammation (hepatitis C virus) and typhoid fever (S. typhi) . Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies can also cause other diseases such as tetanus (Clostridium tetani), gaseous gangrene (C. perfringens), toxic contamination of food (E. coli), tuberculosis (Mycobacterium tuberculosis), paratyphoid fever (Salmonella paratyphi), bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae) and cholera (V. cholerae)..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">PRIONS IN WATER CAUSES DEMENTIA AND LOSS OF BRAIN POWER.</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BURIAL CAUSES SOULS TO GET TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER ON EARTH-- MISERABLE --FOR ENDLESS SUFFERING ..IN ANOTHER TEN YEARS 98% OF CHRISTIANS WILL BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<br /><br />MUSLIMS ARE STUCK DUE TO APOSTASY LAWS\u2026.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHINA HAS DIPPED INTO THIS BLOGSITE AND HAS RECENTLY BANNED ALL BURIAL FOR ATHEIST COMMIES / MUSLIMS/ CHRISTIANS ...BECAUSE OF PRIONS IN GROUNDWATER..&nbsp; &nbsp; CREMATION CAUSES ZERO POLLUTION\u2026</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nPRIONS FROM DEAD BURIED BODIES INVADE WATER AQUIFERS AND CAUSE PRION DISEASES LIKE SPONGIFORM ENCEPHALOPATHIES. (TSEs)\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE TO LEARN FROM TRUE HISTORY -- NOT FAKE HISTORY WRITTEN BY ROTHSCHILDs COMMIE HISTORIANS\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nKuru is not caused by a bacteria, virus, or fungus. Infectious, abnormal proteins known as prions cause kuru. \u2026. Prions are not living organisms and do not reproduce. \u2026They are inanimate, misshapen proteins that multiply in the brain and form clumps, hindering normal brain processes\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCreutzfeldt-Jakob, Gerstmann-Str\u00e4ussler-Scheinker disease, and fatal familial insomnia are other degenerative diseases caused by prions. These spongiform diseases, as well as kuru, create sponge-like holes in your brain \u2026 Prions that cause kuru can\u2019t be easily destroyed\u2026 Brains contaminated with prions remain infectious even when preserved in formaldehyde for years\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6649907494320464324\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">WHEN THE FINAL AND 16TH VERSE WAS TO BE RECITED-- THE GUJARATI KING SAID --\"I WILL RECITE IT FOR YOU \"..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"></span><br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE LAID OUT THE FINAL ANTHEYESTHI ( LAST FUNERAL RITE ) -- THAT PARSIS MUST NOT CREMATE AS PER HINDU RITES --THEY MUST FOLLOW ANOTHER CUSTOM WHICH WAS PREVALENT IN ANCIENT IRAN AMONG NON-HINDUS..THAT OF OFFERING THEIR DEAD BODIES TO VULTURES..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are sixteen rituals (Shodasa samskaras) prescribed by scriptures and adhered across the land of Bharath for 30 millenniums.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">1/Garba Aadhana - Pre consummation rites which purify the parents</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">2/Pumsavana - Rites for the carrying mother</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">3/Simantonnayana - Prenatal rite for the protection of carrying mother and her womb</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">4/Jatakarma - Natal rite purifying the new born</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">5/Namakarana - Naming Ceremony</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">6/Nishkramana - Exposing the infant to outside world</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">7/Annaprashana - First Feeding of solid food</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">8/Chaulam - Tonsure</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">9/Karnavedhana - Piercing the ears</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">10/Aksharaabhyasa or Vidyaramba - Beginning of Education</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">11/Upanayana - Opening the eye of wisdom. Lit. bringing near the Guru, scripture and God. Investiture of Sacred Thread.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">12/Vedaarambha - Initiation into the Vedic Education</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">13/Keshanta or Ritusuddhi - Whole body Shave for boys or Nuptial rites for girls</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">14/Samaavartana - Convocation or Completion of Education</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">15/ Vivaha - Marriage</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\">16/ Anthyeshti - Funeral Rites</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AS PER THE KING, PARSIS WERE NOT ENTITLED TO MOKSHA IN THE HOLY LAND OF BHARAT..</span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM SURE SUBRAMIAN SWAMY WOULD LOVE TO HEAR ABOUT HIS WIFEs RELIGION..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/shikimate-pathway-cancer-spurt-in-india.html?showComment=1532691997056#c1596529403760813035\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 27, 2018 at 5:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE GUJARATI KING EXPECTED THE PARSIS TO GO BACK, IF THEY ARE REAL FOLLOWERS OF SANATANA DHARMA<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE NOT!<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THEY JUST LEARNT THE 16 SAMSKARA VERSES IN SANSKRIT TO FOOL THE KING</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE GUJARATI KING WAS NOT AN IDIOT.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE ONLY REAL SAMSKARA OF A HINDU-- IS THAT HE MUST CREMATE HIS DEAD BODY ( TO FOLLOWS LAWS OF KARMA AND MOKSHA )</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS SUBJECTIVE WISDOM !!<br />\n<br />\nMODERN JUDGES ARE OBJECTIVE ..<br />\n<br />\nKHAPS WERE SUBJECTIVE -- AND HENCE GAVE NATURAL JUSTICE ( DHARMA ) ROOTED IN LOCAL CULTURE .<br />\n<br />\nCULTURE IS EVERYTHING !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_5B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; color: black; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\">.<br />\n\n\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAugust 13, 2018 at 7:42 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttps://edition.cnn.com/2018/08/10/us/parker-solar-probe-launch-nasa/index.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE TRAITOR BENAMI MEDIA HAS STOPPED SHOUTING THAT HINDUSIM\nIS FULL OF SUPERSTITION, EVER SINCE THIS BLOGSITE HAS BECOME POPULAR\nWORLDWIDE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttps://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n714 MILLION IS THE PROFILE VIEW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSO NOW THESE JUDASES ( WHO SOLD BHARATMATA FOR A PIECE OF\nKOSHER SILVER ) HAVE SHIFTRED TRACKS--THEY CONCENTRATE ON SHOUTING THAT HINDUS\nARE VIOLENT..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS HARD TO CONVINCE ANYBODY THAT VEGETARIANS CAN BE\nVIOLENT...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN IS A TRANSFORMER..&nbsp;\nENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED OR DESTROYED AS PER THE VEDAS- IT CAN ONLY\nBE TRANSFORMED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVEDAS WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE MILLIONS\nOF THESE VERSES WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTRANSMISSION BY ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES IS THE GREATEST\nFEAT OF MANKIND.. IT COULD HAPPEN ONLY BECAUSE THESE VERSES HAD DIVINE MATH\nEMBEDDED.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES ,\nPASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL,\nPRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY WE HINDUS INSIST THAT SRUTIS WERE DOWNLOADED\nFROM AKASHA.. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN\nBE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF MAYA MENTIONED\nIN RIG VEDA 72 TIMES AND 29 TIMES IN ATHARVA VEDA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAYA IS INVISIBLE- NO HUMAN CAN SEE BEYOND THE QUANTUM\nSCREEN.. OUR 5 SENSES ARE SQUELCHED FOR OUR OWN SURVIVAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM PHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT\nWHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE COSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION (\nPRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL OF THEM PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR\nWILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTRANSFORMER ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT\nVISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHAT WE SEE AS MATTER IS ACTUALLY VIBRATING ENERGY -- THIS\nWAS WRITTEN IN OUR VEDAS--LIFTED BY JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN AND PATENTED IN HIS\nNAME..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED BY BRAHMA OR DESTROYED BY\nSHIVA --IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED BY VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL\nAVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY VISHNU HAS MORTAL AVATARS --SHIVA AND BRAHMA CANNOT\nHAVE MORTAL AVATARS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU\nARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE\n( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH\nACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET\nEARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH\nMAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.\nWHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN\nCHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE ,\nFEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE\nELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS\nAND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW\nVIBGYOR COLORS ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:45 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHATEVER IS INVENTED/ DISCOVERED BY MAN TILL TODAY AND WILL\nBE INVENTED / DISCOVERED IN FUTURE WAS ALREADY INVENTED BEFORE THE LAST\nPRALAYA. MAN IS JUST A CHANNEL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE AIM OF A HINDU IS LIBERATION FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS-- SO\nTHAT HIS SOUL CAN GO HOME AND MERGE WITH THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY WHEN THE SOUL FREQUENCY AND FREQUENCY\nOF THE MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ( MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD \u2013SEVENTH ASTRAL\nLAYER ) IS THE SAME.. WHEN THIS HAPPENS NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO AND THE\nHUMAN EGO IS ZERO.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE ARE JIVAN MUKTS ( ALIVE ON PLANET EARTH ) WHOSE EGO IS\nZERO AND WHOSE SOULS HAVE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN WHOSE FIELD EXTENDS TILL EARTH..\nTHESE ARE THE COMPASSIONATE SAGES WE REFER TO IN OUR PURANAS . A JIVAN MUKT HAS\nHIS KUNDALINI RAISED TO SAHASRARA CHAKRA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nROGUES GO TO HIMALAYAS PRETEND TO HAVE SEEN ROTHSCHIDs\nCREATION BABAJI AND CLAIM TO HAVE INSTANT KUNDALINI RAISE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANT LESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE BY PRAYING TO GOD.. A\nHINDU CULTIVATES SHRADDHA --NOT BHAKTI UNLIKE SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLY BOOK\nRELIGIONS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IS A POSTIVE ENERGY EMANATING FROM WITHIN WHICH\nFACTORS IN HUMAN CONSCIENCE.. THERE CANNOT BE SINGLE HOLY BOOK DOGMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA CANNOT BE BLIND FAITH, IT IS ENLIGHTENED FAITH\u2014\nSELF VERIFICATION IS INVOLVED IN EVERY INCH OF YOUR SPRIRITUAL PROGRESS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IMPIES SELF RELIANCE , AN INDEPENDENT SENSE OF\nRIGHT OR WRONG , RELIANCE ON OWN CONSCIENCE AND COURGAGE OF ONEs SOUL\nCONVICTIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS CAN NEVER RUSH OUT OF TEMPLES ENMASSE\nAFTER FRIDAY NOON PRAYERS AND START KILLING PEOPLE OF OTHER RELIGIONS ENMASSE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SANATANA DHARMA AFFORDS THIS UNBRIDLED FREEDOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA HINDU DOES NOT NEED TO BE SAVES BY ANY MESSIAH.. HE NEEDS\nNO ENTRY PERMISSION AT THE PEARLY GATES \u2013THERE IS NO HOUR OF JUDGEMENT . HIS\nSOUL IS SUBJECTED TO THE UNINERSAL LAWS OF QUANTUM PHYSICS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLIBERATION IS ONLY THOUGH KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSANATANA DHARMA ASKS YOU TO WAKE UP, OTHER RELIGIONS ASK YOU\nTO REPENT..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND\nSANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. BHAGWAD GITA WAS INJECTED WITH\nPOISON REPLACING SHRADDHA WITH BHAKTI..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANNOT GET INSTANT MOKSHA BY DIPPING IN GANGES . NO GURU\nCAN GIVE YOU DEEKSHA FOR MOKSHA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN A SON DOES SHRADDH FOR HIS DEAD FATHER , HE HELPS HIS\nFATHERs SOUL RISE BY ONE ASTRAL LAYER.. THIS IS A ONE TIME AFFAIR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND OF INDIA\u2014AND ONLY TO\nMEN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWOMEN ( CANNOT BE DEVOID OF EGO ) WHOSE SOULS ARE PARKED IN\nTHE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER HAVE TO TAKE RE-BIRTH AS MAN TO GET MOKSHA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMIC BAGGAGE CAN BE LESSENED ONLY BY GOOD DEEDS AND BEING\nCREATIVE --SO THAT YOU PROVE THAT YOU MADE A DIFFERENCE TO THIS PLANET FOR THE\nBETTER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"SOUL\" GIVES PERPETUAL MOTION TO YOUR HEART . YOUR\nSOUL WAS ONCE PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD .. IT YEARNS TO MERGE BACK --IT YEARNS\nFOR MOKSHA ( HOME COMING )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU GET MOKSHA YOUR SOUL HAS MERGED WITH BRAHMAN (\nMOTHER FIELD ) AND YOU ARE NOW FREE FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL GIVES FEEDBACK TO BRAHMAN OF YOUR LIFEs\nEXPERIENCES-- BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS SOUL EVOLUTION.. THERE IS NOTHING LIKE DARWINs\nEVOLUTION FROM MONEKY TO MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINS MIND IS TOO SHALLOW -- ONLY A MAD\nMAN CAN SAY THAT THE GIRAFFEs NECK BECAME LONGER BECAUSE LEAVES WENT HIGHER ON\nTREE BRANCHES.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIN THIS DNA AGE, OUR NCERT BOOKS EACH OUR KIDS IN SCHOOL\nABOUT DARWINs MISSING LINK..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBURN ALL SCHOOL AND COLLEGE TEXT BOOKS IN INDIA WHICH TEACH\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINs EVOLUTION IN THIS DNA AGE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE DEMAND THAT THIS BE SUBSTITUTED BY INTELLIGENT DESIGN BY\nBRAHMAN\u2014THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE SOUL WHICH EVOLVES ( from lowest frequency of\nunicelled fungus to highest moksha human Jivan Mukt frequency ) ACCORDING TO\n400 CENTURY OLD VEDANTA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMA CONTROLS MOKSHA --WHICH MEANS YOUR SOUL GOES TO THE\n7TH ASTRAL LAYER -- AND YOU ARE NOW GOD YOURSELF AS YOU ( SOUL ) MATCHES THE\nMOTHER FIELDS HIGHEST FREQUENCY -NEVER TO BE RE-INDUCTED AGAIN BACK ON PLANET\nEARTH<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 3-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. AWAITING RE-INDUCTION .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONCE YOU BECOME A HUMAN AND YOUR SOUL IS PARKED IN ASTRAL\nLAYERS TWO TO SIX\u2014YOU WILL NOT BE RE-INDUCTED AS A LOWER FORM OF LIFE LIKE\nANIMAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST\nFREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING\nSPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE\nPHYSICAL BODY ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB\nMOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN\nASTRAL LAYERS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA USHERS IN --<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS\nTHAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE DOG REPRESENTED DHARMA ( YAMA ) \u2014 YUDHISHTRA WAS \u201cSON OF\nDHARMA \u201c..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN )\nYUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS\nLIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 )\nDECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL\nHAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA\n.. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES--\nHE DID IT AND HOW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX\nWITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5\nPANDAVAS TOO..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER READING THE MAHABHARATA EPIC -- ALL WONDERED WHY\nKRISHNA PLAYED FOUL--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIF YOU REALLY LOOK AT IT DISPASSIONATELY -- HE GAVE ALL 100\nTEST TUBE BABIES MOKSHA-- THE ULTIMATE GIFT FROM VISHNUs AVATAR ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT\u2014 BRAHMAN DOES NOT ALLOW\nSTAGNATION.. IN SANATANA DHARMA THERE ARE NO CIRCLES\u2014ONLY SPIRALS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH\n--THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE\nDECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST\nASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS\n\"PURGATORY\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR\nANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES -- IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF\n\"GRATITUDE\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE LAWS OF KARMA THAT COMPELS HINDUS TO BEHAVE\nRIGHTEOUSLY AS PER THE UNIVERSAL MORAL ORDER OR LAWS OF DHARMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE HINDU KNOWS THAT KARMA IS IN HIS OWN HANDS .. THIS IS\nWHY A HINDU IS THE SAME OUTSIDE DOORS AND WITHIN DOORS.. A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT\nNEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE RASCAL SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TOLD ON NDTV THAT MEN CAN\nHAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.. MODI GAVE THIS FAKE GURU A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI\nSRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n</li>\n</div>\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">CONSANGUINEOUS\nMARRIAGES</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">, &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">KHAP PANCHAYAT PETITION TO AMEND HINDU MARRIAGE ACT</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">, &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">MITOCHONDRIAL DNA, &nbsp;GENETIC MALE LINEAGE-&nbsp;</span>CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nearly three and a half\ndecades ago, I was in Mumbai doing my Mate\u2019s exams. While walking down to a\nnearby restaurant with my friend for lunch , we came across a purse full of\nmoney lying on the street.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since it was a Sunday, the street was fairly\ndeserted. &nbsp;Pretty soon a guy came from\nthe opposite direction , and it appeared that he was indeed searching frantically\nfor his purse, his eyes darting here and there on the ground. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So we asked him \u201c Have\nyou lost something?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said \u201d Yes, my purse\nis missing from my back pocket\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">Immediately a Bawajee (\nan old Parsee gentleman ) within &nbsp;earshot\nstarted imploring at the top of his voice \u201c </span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Maine nahi liya! Maine nahi liya!\u2014Mai\u2014</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\">\u201c &nbsp;in a shrill squeaky voice.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I took out the purse\nand gave it to the rightful owner and then all the three of us tried to convince the\nBawajee , that the purse is indeed found, &nbsp;and that nobody has accused him of stealing\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be frank, we spent\nthe next 5 minutes calming this hyper venting old man, that he is NOT involved at all, the purse has been found and all is fine.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">confirmed</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; They said , NO, he did not screw Sally--technically or non-technically.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
