Blood exposed to\ninfrared light had less blood cell aggregation (clumping together) which would\nfree up more surface area of red blood cells to transfer nutrients and oxygen\nto tissues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surya Namaskar\nincreases cardiovascular fitness.&nbsp; This\nis a&nbsp; a combined measure of a number of\ndifferent parameters, such as resting pulse, rise of pulse after exertion,\nblood pressure lying and standing, rise in blood pressure after exertion, and\ntime for pulse rate to return to normal after exertion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ivi9ak7meFE/UKqJd19FfYI/AAAAAAAAYnQ/u46exJyLKGI/s1600/DDFT68.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ivi9ak7meFE/UKqJd19FfYI/AAAAAAAAYnQ/u46exJyLKGI/s320/DDFT68.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After sunbathing,\nlactic acid, the by-product of muscle metabolism that causes soreness and\nstiffness after strenuous exercise, is significantly reduced. Oxygen deficiency has been readily\nlinked to a host of illnesses and discomforts ranging from chronic fatigue to\ncancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sunlight speeds up the\nclearance of toxins from the body several times. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means , you will\nbe surprised to know that,&nbsp; a fine spray\nof hydraulic oil or luboil or no 1 Fuel oil , will catch fire faster than a\nfine spray of Methanol or&nbsp; Naptha or even\nHydrogen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This temperature is\nrequired to supply the activation energy needed for combustion. The temperature\nat which a chemical will ignite decreases as the pressure increases or oxygen\nconcentration increases<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain Lub oils have a\nAIT of 250 deg C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QrBipUDLXEY/UKhj73zwhjI/AAAAAAAAYfs/wdOR2bxZ3y4/s1600/downloadDDDDDDDDD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"350\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QrBipUDLXEY/UKhj73zwhjI/AAAAAAAAYfs/wdOR2bxZ3y4/s400/downloadDDDDDDDDD.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fuel or Chemical/</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">( deg C)</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diethyl ether&nbsp;&nbsp; 160<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acetaldehyde&nbsp; 175<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fuel Oil No.1&nbsp; 210<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerosene&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 210<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">n-Octane&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 220<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">n-Hexane&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 225<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cyclohexane&nbsp;&nbsp; 245<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydrogen&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 500<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ethane&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;515<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">p-Xylene&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 530<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Toluene&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 530<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naphtha&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 550<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Benzene&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 560<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coal-tar oil&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 580<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane (Natural Gas)&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 580<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Light gas&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 600<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon monoxide&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 609<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Light hydrocarbons&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 650<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OPFQAKFWcIs/UKhkDBkng_I/AAAAAAAAYf0/Gb4b7QwFiO4/s1600/AAAAAA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"310\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OPFQAKFWcIs/UKhkDBkng_I/AAAAAAAAYf0/Gb4b7QwFiO4/s400/AAAAAA.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lowest temperature\nat which a substance will ignite in the presence of an external source of\nignition is known as its flash point. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydrogen is less\nflammable than a fine spray of&nbsp; Kerosene.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For liquids, it is\ndefined as the lowest temperature at which a drop of solvent will ignite\nspontaneously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ethyl ether has an auto\nignition temperature of 160\u00b0C , and its vapors have been ignited by hot\npressurized steam pipes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hEIoYd6HfDM/UKhruys4t0I/AAAAAAAAYhA/tPRhio5GgoI/s1600/downloadFRT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"303\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hEIoYd6HfDM/UKhruys4t0I/AAAAAAAAYhA/tPRhio5GgoI/s400/downloadFRT.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>SPONTANEOUS COMBUSTION </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5jtUzmdukLQ/UKhkjF0rZCI/AAAAAAAAYf8/U0a2IvTV7w8/s1600/imagesCCCCC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5jtUzmdukLQ/UKhkjF0rZCI/AAAAAAAAYf8/U0a2IvTV7w8/s400/imagesCCCCC.jpg\" width=\"390\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some materials when\ndamp or soaked with oil, especially oil of vegetable origin, are liable to\nignite without the external application of heat as the result of gradual\nheating within the material produced by oxidation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The risk of spontaneous\ncombustion is smaller with petroleum oils than with vegetable oils ( like\nrapeseed ) , but it can still occur, particularly if the material is kept warm,\nfor example by proximity to a hot pipe. Boiler suits must not be dried in\nengine room. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cotton waste, rags,\ncanvas, any similar absorbent material should therefore not be stowed near oil,\npaint, etc. and should not be left lying on the jetty, on decks, on equipment,\non or around pipelines etc. If such materials become damp, they should be dried\nbefore being stowed away. If soaked with oil they should be cleaned or\ndestroyed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain chemicals used\nfor boiler treatment are also oxidising agents and though carried in diluted\nform are capable of spontaneous combustion if permitted to evaporate. Oxidising\nchemicals must be stowed under supervision of Chief officer/ Chief engineer.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2aLOz-qfmN0/UKhqxbYeefI/AAAAAAAAYgQ/gK47vT3yE00/s1600/downloadhhjiioio.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2aLOz-qfmN0/UKhqxbYeefI/AAAAAAAAYgQ/gK47vT3yE00/s400/downloadhhjiioio.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I remember stowing\nChinese Calcium Hypochlorite containers on top most outboard end row--away from the accomodation, &nbsp;incurring\na small fortune in container shifting charges in 1993 --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- and all were terribly upset\nwith me.&nbsp; My crew were surprised when I\nwould tell them to spray some seawater using hoses on a very hot sea voyage afternoon\n, on these containers.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RH1O8cgd5ro/UKhq2tEjCjI/AAAAAAAAYgY/3SprPIsnIh4/s1600/imagesfffff.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RH1O8cgd5ro/UKhq2tEjCjI/AAAAAAAAYgY/3SprPIsnIh4/s400/imagesfffff.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The German charterers\ncomplained to the Dutch Owners and the Owners to the Hong Kong Tech Managers-- in\na sort of \"we don\u2019t want this Captain , if you cant shape him up\". &nbsp;They were of\nthe opinion that this Indian Captain is stupid .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But my shit did NOT\nsmell those days, with my tech Mangers \u2013 they were all scared of me-- as they\nconsidered me as the Hitler type Belgian Jew MD\u2019s \u201dblue eyed boy\u201d.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Belgian Jew was the type who would send goons to your house to break your bones-- if you fu#k around with him. &nbsp;He is dead now-- otherwise I would have given a nice bio data about him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">I am a hard core Chemical\nman, and I did NOT care for these ignorant bosses ashore . &nbsp;This is what is good at sea--you&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">don't</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;need to be a hypocrite.</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>I just told them to FU#K OFF !!&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>On Capt Vadakayil's ship nobody can ever order him \"HARD A PORT\" , &nbsp;from ashore\u2014 PERIOD!.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D6qR3Y7v90k/UKhq7bTpMcI/AAAAAAAAYgg/phfnwGcWXgQ/s1600/imagesffrrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D6qR3Y7v90k/UKhq7bTpMcI/AAAAAAAAYgg/phfnwGcWXgQ/s400/imagesffrrr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It took another decade\nfor proper legislation to take place, and that too after several Containerships\nwere totally gutted with loss of life.. &nbsp;Between\n1997 and 1999 there were 6 very large (multi-million pound loss) incidents on\ncontainer ships involving calcium hypochlorite in various forms, including the\n\u201cContship France\u201d, \u201cMaersk Mombasa\u201d, \u201cSea Express\u201d, \u201cDG Harmony\u201d, \u201cAconcagua\u201d\nand the \u201cCMA Djakarta\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium Hypochlorite is\nused extensively world wide for purifying water supplies and to a great extent\nin swimming pools. The chemical readily decomposes to release chlorine and\noxygen, the components which make it useful as a disinfectant product.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A side\neffect of this process is the reaction with combustible materials leading to\nspontaneous ignition and severe fires, promoted by the oxygen released from the\nchemical which renders ineffective the gas smothering systems typically used\nfor fire fighting in ships holds.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This characteristic as an oxidising agent had\nled to calcium hypochlorite being classified within Class 5.1 of the\nInternational Maritime Dangerous Goods (IMDG) Code. drums of calcium\nhypochlorite had a propensity to undergo a self-accelerating decomposition\nreaction that concluded with an explosion releasing large clouds of thick white\n\u201csmoke\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This occurs when the heat produced by the decomposition reaction is\nunable to escape from inside the chemical package (because it is big, well\ninsulated or in a hot environment). The temperature at which decomposition was\ninitiated was found to be about 70 degC for drums of good quality material. An\nincrease in the water content of the chemical could decrease the temperature at\nwhich the self accelerating decomposition could start, as could the presence of\nseveral different types of contaminants.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vvotNES3vH8/UKhrLe4FE3I/AAAAAAAAYg4/Q4VXq9oFhUI/s1600/imagesmmmm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"227\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vvotNES3vH8/UKhrLe4FE3I/AAAAAAAAYg4/Q4VXq9oFhUI/s400/imagesmmmm.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium hypochlorite was subsequently classified under 3 headings,\nUN1748, the high strength, dry material (with more than 39% available\nchlorine); UN2880, hydrated material with between 5.5% and 10% moisture, and\nUN2208, low strength material (typically known as bleaching powder) with\nbetween 10% and 39% free chlorine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Material with less than 10% available\nchlorine was not classified within the IMDG Code. UN1748 material was only to\nbe carried on deck and \u201caway from\u201d sources of heat. UN2880 and UN2208 material\ncould be carried under deck, UN2880 material also being stowed \u201caway from\u201d\nsources of heat \u201cwhere temperatures in excess of 55oC for a period of 24 hours\nor more will be encountered\u201d.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The International Group\nof P&amp;I Clubs initiated a serious study. The study found that\nself-accelerating decomposition in a 40ft container.&nbsp; Self combustion could start at temperatures as\nlow as 36 deg C.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ap_As0v9UgQ/UKhrEu4Ak1I/AAAAAAAAYgw/dD8koAp9Sjc/s1600/imagesji000.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"261\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ap_As0v9UgQ/UKhrEu4Ak1I/AAAAAAAAYgw/dD8koAp9Sjc/s400/imagesji000.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The IMDG Code currently has 3 entries for calcium\nhypochlorite: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UN 1748&nbsp; Calcium Hypochlorite, Dry or Calcium\nHypochlorite Mixture, Dry with more than 39% available chlorine (8.8% available\noxygen) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UN 2208&nbsp; Calcium Hypochlorite Mixture, Dry with more\nthan 10% but not more than 39% available chlorine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UN 2880 Calcium\nHypochlorite Hydrated or Calcium Hypochlorite Hydrated Mixture with not less\nthan 5.5% but not more than 16% water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Code notes that\nthese materials are liable to exothermic decomposition at elevated temperatures\nand shall be shaded from direct sunlight and all sources of heat and placed in\nadequately ventilated areas. It also warns that decomposition can be initiated\nby impurities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eTFPEE8uaQg/UKhq_CwvwMI/AAAAAAAAYgo/coPXcfd6CjE/s1600/imageseeee.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eTFPEE8uaQg/UKhq_CwvwMI/AAAAAAAAYgo/coPXcfd6CjE/s320/imageseeee.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The changes came into effect in January 2001.-- better late than never</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); none;\">November 19, 2012 at 1:04 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi ,<br /><br />on chemical tankers when we carry vegetable then charterers have to pay for shore pre-wash if there is too much clingage due to freezing weather.<br /><br />any injuries or death the ship's crew --and you can sue everybody involved .<br /><br />it is now ILLEGAL to squeegee even for PURE veg oils.<br /><br />from what i can see ship's crew is forced to do manual squeegeing even for compounds like BIOFUELS , palm oil fatty acid compounds and animal fats and fish oil ( which contain viruses and vermin ).<br /><br />any sailor who is forced to do this-- must quote this blog post -- made by capt ajit vadakayil--<br /><br />and complain to the port state control and IMO. except for paris MOU -- rest of the PSC MOU are ignorant, including the almighty US COAST GUARD mou for USA.<br /><br />you can construe that CAPT VADAKAYIL IS AN EXPERT ON THIS SUBJECT ON THIS PLANET.<br /><br />when we carry spontaneous combustion veg oils like rape seed oil i do NOT allow the crew to dry their boiler suits in the engine room , or even electric spin driers.<br /><br />once my officers and crew challenged me in a safety meet, regarding this.<br /><br />so the next day i arranged a boilersuit to be dipped in rapeseed oil, got it washed for 1 hour in the laundry machine.<br /><br />then i got it in a sunny area on the monkey island ( hot day ) placed it in a metal drum painted black, half covered with a black painted lid -- with constant human watch.<br /><br />after sometime someone came running to the wheelhouse , that smoke has started coming --and soon the boiler suit was fully burnt .<br /><br />NOW REGARDING HUMAN BEING BURSTING INTO FLAMES.<br /><br />this can happen only of the subject is fully drunk with potent alcohol , and he had been on a low carb diet which produces ACETONE, and then he fell asleep while smoking.<br /><br />in one of my posts an INDIAN ARMY MAJOR, was burnt completely in his army tent -- and the indian army out this as suicide. his tent mate, another fellow officer escaped.<br /><br 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 28, 2017 at 11:49 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFIGHTING FIRES IS AN ART<br /><br />YOU HAVE TO KNOW<br /><br />YOU CAN PUT OUT A FIRE IN SECONDS<br /><br />WHEN PEOPLE DONT KNOW BASICS THEY FIGHT FIRES FOR DAYS<br /><br />I CAN GET THE TOP TEN FIRE FIGHTING EXPERTS ON THIS PLANET AND PUT THEM THROUGH A 100 ITEM TEST<br /><br />ALL WILL FAIL MISERABLY<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-fire-fighting-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/vapor-pressure-bleve-on-chemical.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/ar-afff-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/auto-ignition-dangers-on-chemical.html</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">( 29 YEARS IN COMMAND)&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "10", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1155965893108131944/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3608974640594162707", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-11-17T13:06:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-03-03T00:31:01+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzkzNzg2ODYxMzAzCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/savita-halappanavar-murder-of.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3608974640594162707", "title": "SAVITA HALAPPANAVAR , THE MURDER OF THE HIPPOCRATIC OATH-- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LPugbr01N3o/UKuL9_49EqI/AAAAAAAAYt0/c1uukuH1pVQ/s1600/JKYKTY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LPugbr01N3o/UKuL9_49EqI/AAAAAAAAYt0/c1uukuH1pVQ/s400/JKYKTY.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">CATHOLIC ABORTION LAW , </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WHEN CATHOLIC COMPASSION KILLS</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"> , &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">IRISH COWARDICE</span></b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">&nbsp;, </span><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">EVIL VATICAN &nbsp;ETHOS , <span style=\"color: red;\">WAKE UP CALL</span>&nbsp;</span></b>-- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tGKfkF0jKqI/UKc9z-4a1BI/AAAAAAAAYbA/y55XHyrdB0Y/s1600/th14-hasan-Indi_TH_1268929f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tGKfkF0jKqI/UKc9z-4a1BI/AAAAAAAAYbA/y55XHyrdB0Y/s320/th14-hasan-Indi_TH_1268929f.jpg\" height=\"294\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savita, aged 31, was 17\nweeks pregnant when she died in University Hospital Galway , Ireland after\nsuffering a miscarriage and septicaemia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her husband Praveen,\n34, claimed she had complained of being in agonising pain. &nbsp;He has said that doctors refused to carry out\na medical termination because the foetus\u2019s heartbeat was present. Never mind that Savita had a &nbsp;heart beat too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">For three days Mr Halappanavar and his wife Savita cried and begged for a termination, stating that they were neither Irish nor Catholic .&nbsp;</span></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">They were&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">tersely</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;told</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">:\n</span><span style=\"color: red; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThis is a Catholic country.\u201d</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">If this is indeed the case do Muslims need to eat PIG in Ireland ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fetus, being only\n17 weeks old, had zilch hope of survival outside the womb ( even lungs wont be formed ) , and Savita's unfortunate miscarriage was irreversible. &nbsp;Her cervix was already dilated and the amniotic\nfluid was leaking out.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing could be done to save the baby's life, but a\nmedical abortion would almost certainly have saved Savita's.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What made the Catholic doctors\nat Galway University Hospital, of Ireland , &nbsp;prioritize a unborn baby\u2019s doomed existence above\nSavita's clear and present life?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savita was left in unbearable\nagony for 3 days until the fetal heartbeat stopped. By then, it was too late.\nSavita developed septicemia as a result of being left with an open cervix,\nwhich invites infection into the body, for three days. She died on 28th October\n2012.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savita\u2019s husband\u2019s\nharrowing and heart rending account of her last days, and their horrendous\nordeal, &nbsp;has devastated the compassionate\ndenizens of this planet. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savita and her husband\nwere NOT asking for an abortion. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nwere just begging for her life to be saved.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did Vatican and their\npadres who cannot marry , love Savita\u2019s unborn child more than its mother, by\nany means ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attitude of\nofficials at the Indian Embassy in Ireland was disgusting . They did NOT come\nto help after Savita\u2019s death, &nbsp;saying\nthat Monday was a government holiday. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian ambassador\nto Ireland, Debashish Chakravarti, later says \u201cMy embassy is monitoring the developments\u201d.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do\nwe have an embassy just to attend cocktail parties?&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you noticed , that\nthe only time OUR LEADER Sonia Gandhi,-- our Italian Catholic Queen Bee speaks out nowadays\nis to defend her family, from corruption charges.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She cares NOT for the sailors held up in Somalia. She cares NOT for the horrible treatment dished out to the servile Indian expatriate workers in the racist Arab countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4e06qbURNdU/UKc95CchbUI/AAAAAAAAYbI/oK5gcpwVEkc/s1600/downloadRRTT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4e06qbURNdU/UKc95CchbUI/AAAAAAAAYbI/oK5gcpwVEkc/s320/downloadRRTT.jpg\" height=\"239\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where is the leadership\nand political will in India, to address the murder of an innocent woman, who\nwas denied an abortion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RF_Ha-KlOKY/UKdbGgHaDCI/AAAAAAAAYbw/7FAMd5AUbZI/s1600/hippocratic-oath-medicine_dayala0332c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RF_Ha-KlOKY/UKdbGgHaDCI/AAAAAAAAYbw/7FAMd5AUbZI/s1600/hippocratic-oath-medicine_dayala0332c.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me put down the\nHippocratic oath taken by the Irish doctors.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I swear to fulfill, to\nthe best of my ability and judgment, this covenant:<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will respect the\nhard-won scientific gains of those physicians in whose steps I walk, and gladly\nshare such knowledge as is mine with those who are to follow.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will apply, for the\nbenefit of the sick, all measures which are required, avoiding those twin traps\nof over treatment and therapeutic nihilism.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will remember that\nthere is art to medicine as well as science, and that warmth, sympathy, and\nunderstanding may outweigh the surgeon's knife or the chemist's drug.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will not be ashamed\nto say \"I know not,\" nor will I fail to call in my colleagues when\nthe skills of another are needed for a patient's recovery.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will respect the\nprivacy of my patients, for their problems are not disclosed to me that the\nworld may know. Most especially must I tread with care in matters of life and\ndeath. If it is given me to save a life, all thanks. But it may also be within\nmy power to take a life; this awesome responsibility must be faced with great\nhumbleness and awareness of my own frailty. Above all, I must not play at God.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--Lb_Po2AFkk/UKdcKgaJeGI/AAAAAAAAYcI/s60T6c97_QA/s1600/the-hippocratic-oath-13589.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--Lb_Po2AFkk/UKdcKgaJeGI/AAAAAAAAYcI/s60T6c97_QA/s640/the-hippocratic-oath-13589.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"482\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will remember that I\ndo not treat a fever chart, a cancerous growth, but a sick human being, whose\nillness may affect the person's family and economic stability. My\nresponsibility includes these related problems, if I am to care adequately for\nthe sick.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will prevent disease\nwhenever I can, for prevention is preferable to cure.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I will remember that I\nremain a member of society, with special obligations to all my fellow human\nbeings, those sound of mind and body as well as the infirm.<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>If I do not violate\nthis oath, may I enjoy life and art, respected while I live and remembered with\naffection thereafter. May I always act so as to preserve the finest traditions\nof my calling and may I long experience the joy of healing those who seek my\nhelp.</b></span></i><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YzTSdkicexs/UKdQx0e-8wI/AAAAAAAAYbc/QN_SrV96_-Y/s1600/64159475_apoutsideleinsterhouseindublin016504007.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
